name: Earth Rising
description: Earth Rising - A game about building CubeSat and learning more about this small satellite and how it functions. You are in the role of a robot that has a mission to put into space as many CubeSat satellites as you can so you can find different resources for future space flight development.

name: Opaloid Kingdom
description: Explore dungeons filled with monsters, traps and gold coins! Opaloid Kingdom is a retro-style dungeon crawler set in a medieval world. Enjoy quick and satisfying gameplay in a magical land full of wizards, treasure and dragons!

name: Spike II: The Great Emu War
description: Equipped of your minigun, try to survive to the horde of emus who will do their best to catch you.

name: Lust Academy: Season 2
description: Continue your adventure in Cordale Academy, following up on your previous choices and experiencing all-new content, including: Story, Animations, Locations, Quests and more!

name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Deluxe Edition
description:
Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Deluxe Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Mini Art Book
- Melodies of the Macabre

name: Car Dealership Simulator
description: Car Dealership Simulator is an extremely comprehensive and detailed car dealership business simulation game.

name: Pan'orama
description: Pan'orama is a relaxing and soothing puzzle simulation game in which you create amazing landscapes using different types of tiles, but most of all by discovering the connections between them and finding unique combinations.

name: Marine Hearts
description: You are now a heart wandering the sea. "Marine Hearts" is a first-person 3D deep-sea omnidirectional bullet-hell shooter. You pursue the mysteries of the sea while losing your body and becoming only your mind.

name: Peridot
description: In Peridot, players will raise magical beasts called Peridots.

name: Torchlight: Infinite
description: The fate of Ember Technology is in your hands. With highly customizable character builds and rewarding boss fights, each hero of Torchlight is empowered to defeat the darkness and achieve salvation in this ARPG.

name: Rocket Ghost Aidan 2
description: Rocket Ghost Aidan is on a new adventure through Com's dense dimension. Compact with enemies, treasures to hunt down, and challenges to overcome.

name: Midautumn
description: Crashing at Grandma's was meant to be a break from your responsibilities. But relaxing might prove hard when the Spirit World is real, its entrance is in your basement, and you're its newest guardian. Blast evil spirits and save your hometown in this rogue-like dungeon crawler!

name: Rage Effect
description: Crafted with passion by Goldon Studios, a rising game studio from rural India, Rage Effect delivers an explosive FPS/TPS experience like no other.

name: Infinity Tao
description: Infinity Tao is a Rogue Lite game set in the Ancient Chinese Immortal Cultivation setting. Raise your realm, build powerful Magic Treasures combinations and Synergies, kill thousands of monster and win the 30 minute game.

name: Crimson Fantasia
description:
Yukari is fooling around again and causing youkai to wreak havoc on the the shrine!

Show them who's boss as youkai exterminator extraordinaire Reimu Hakurei in Crimson Fantasia, a twin-stick bullet hell score attack!

name: Multiplicity
description:
Did you know that there are more stars in the sky than grains of sand on Earth? I know, it sounds crazy. But it's true!

A short cosmic horror tale, inspired by the classics of survival horror.

name: Sunken Fallacy
description: Medium-sized flooded Aztec / Mesoamerican ruins (Koohoo) map with a few puzzles and "cheeky" combat, built on Progs Dump 3 (already included). QuakeC and map source is included. Custom music by Patrick Patrikios.

name: Room 817
description: Welcome to one of the scariest old-school horror games. Here, you're not the predator, but the prey. Any mistake will cost you your life. Hide, solve puzzles, explore, and embrace the inevitable terror. The Ancient horror lurks, awaiting you. Based on true events.

name: Onto Maizilind Unto Infinity: Act I - Destruction's Wake
description: Onto Maizilind Unto Infinity is a 3 act game about the end of human civilization and the torment that consumes humanity on the other side of our long-awaited apocalypse.

name: Lost in Darklight
description: Lost in Darklight is a live action interactive FMV game. A retired ace soldier, four girls, a hidden chamber at home, genetic cloning tech... Experience interactive panoramic evidence searching with this game and decide your own ending. Every choice you make is crucial!

name: Abyss
description: Abyss is an action-packed free-to-play fantasy adventure roleplaying game (ARPG) enriched with roguelike elements. Embark on a journey into an endless dungeon, seeking potent equipment while confronting formidable creatures fueled by the captivating essence of biopunk enchantments. Are you prepared to endure an expedition into the heart of the Abyss?

name: Catgotchi: Virtual Pet - Deluxe Edition
description: Welcome to Catgotchi: Virtual Pet, the ultimate game for all cat lovers! Raise and care for your virtual pet. These adorable pixel-art cats are sure to steal your heart!

name: A Hero's Journey
description: The story of the prince and the dragon is a common RPG story type. In the real world, aren't we also in the process of hunting the dragon and then gradually realizing the operating rules of the world around us? Therefore, this game slightly adapts the story and aims to explore the relationship between life and the world, especially in the context of Chinese-style education.

name: Grandma Green
description:
Help a lonely Grandma build her new home!
Play as a lonely widow and pursue her dreams of growing a beautiful garden!

name: King Jister 3
description: A classic medieval point & click first person adventure game.

name: Rosetta
description:
After waking up in a basement and exploring you find a mask of a woman named Rosetta, you will fall for her beauty. Explore the different options of the same conversation and get to know of both of your stories, together.

Rosetta is only 15 minutes long and contains graphic images nudity and explicit language.

name: Pigblue
description: A stranger arrives at a quiet and isolated town... Pigblue.

name: Aphelion Headhunters
description: Aphelion Headhunters is a Third-Person PVE Hero Shooter featuring two unique player characters, each with their own distinct playstyle, abilities and suite of selectable upgrades.

name: Hentai Beach Memories
description: Hentai Beach Memories is a relaxing puzzle game. Flip tiles and find their match to reveal the sexy maid art beneath. 20 beautiful girls are waiting for you.

name: Adventure Mosaics: Autumn Journey
description: Ellie used to think that autumn was a bad time to travel. This journey proved her wrong!

name: Death, Soul & Robots
description: In this captivating Metroidvania game you will take on the role of a cute kitty cat on its mission to find the soul of Planet 42 to rescue the Earth. Fight enemies and bosses, solve puzzles and explore levels in this fascinating game.

name: Guilty Parade: Episode 4
description: The fourth episode of the interactive visual novel with Point & Click elements Guilty Parade.

name: Run Penguin Run
description: Run Penguin Run is an exciting running game where you take control of an adorable penguin and navigate through various obstacles and challenges. The game is designed to be easy to learn and features simple controls, including jumping, sliding, and attacking.

name: Burning Secrets: A Bara Visual Novel
description: In one of Zafir's expeditions, the old wizard disappears and Fin decides to rescue him with Luxus's help. Embark on this journey in Luxus' shoes and have the opportunity to fall in love with one of them playing this short visual novel with multiple endings - including a polyamorous one.

name: Urbex Night Security
description: Horror game based on tension and story. In 1996, some student begins working as a night guard at an abandoned factory on the outskirts of Berlin. There are many unsettling legends surrounding this place, including rumors of people disappearing.

name: Agent Team Simulator
description: Build a team of Elite Secret Agents, and send them on dangerous missions around the globe.

name: Duru: About Mole Rats and Depression
description: Follow the story of Tuli – a story about the struggle with insecurities, depression and friendship, told in a colorful, accessible way. Run, jump and paint your way through puzzle filled tunnels while also dealing with an unhelpful AI companion you just can't get rid of.

name: Darkest Dungeon II
description: The eagerly awaited follow-up to Red Hook's smash hit gothic horror RPG! DDII will test your mettle and drive you to the brink of madness. Armor yourself with purpose and provision your party for the journey ahead. It will be arduous.

name: Strandzha Adventures 3D
description: Epic Fantasy 3D Platformer Game To Experience The Mystical Mountain of the Ancient Thracians. Inspired by the 3D platformer games of the late ’90s. It is an exciting experience among the amazing nature, ancient sanctuaries and legends of the real Strandzha Mountain in Bulgaria.

name: Re: Danganronpa Refresh Retreat
description: After a rather odd kidnapping, 16 people wake up in a mansion, all the doors are locked and it seems like there is no way out. Follow Amy Miller and the fifteen other inhabitants of the refresh retreat as they uncover the mystery surrounding the killing game and who exactly is keeping them imprisoned.

name: Girls Will Bite
description: A girl eats another girl out.

name: Ronald McDonalds
description: Your objective is to steal the secret recipe from McDonald's without Ronald finding you.

name: Zoo Park Story
description:
Ready to build the zoo of your dreams? Depart on wild adventures to find exotic fauna, exploring all manner of environments from savanna to tundra, jungle and beyond! Give your new animal friends a home and take your zoo to the top of the industry!
Savor the thrill of opening day. Feed the animals in your burgeoning lineup—even give them the occasional treat to show you care! From apples to acorns, meat, and more, tailor your critters' diet according to their natural habitat. On that note, do the same with the surrounding flora too!

name: G.O.P.O.T.A.: Adventures at the Railway Station
description:
- Did you make some cool, serious DLC?
- Yes seriously! And you don't believe it?!

name: Project Below
description: In Project Below you wake up locked inside an unknown place and you have to find your way out of that place.

name: Haunted Investigation
description: Haunted Investigation is a spine-tingling horror game that will test your nerves and keep you on the edge of your seat. Whether you choose to play alone or with another friend (up to 2 players), you'll be immersed in a world of terror and suspense as you explore an abandoned mansion.

name: Grow on the Go
description: Care for your leafy friends in this cosy plant care sim and explore new locations from the comfort of your store window. Design your dream workshop and find the best companions for each of your pals.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: France
description: Discover the sights of France while playing fun jigsaw puzzles!

name: TraumaCore Violence
description: TraumaCore Violence is a 2D Character Action Game with a focus on intense, snappy combat and in-depth movement mechanics; set within the psyche of a woman who has just had her life broken.

name: Abandon
description: Abandon is a Boom-compatible wad composed of large, difficult slaughter maps.

name: Rosetta and the Well
description: There are some places in which mermaids don't belong. Perhaps a well in my garden is one of them.

name: Rushdown Rivals Reloaded
description: Take on the robot hordes of Rushdown Rivals from a different perspective! Fight through the city streets in this hectic arcade shooter inspired by Time Crisis and House of the Dead!

name: Suzume: Match 3 Puzzle
description: Suzume: Match 3 Puzzle is a match 3 puzzle mobile game based on the anime movie Suzume.

name: Escape From Russia: Mobilization
description: Originally russian runner, in which you have to find yourself in the shoes of a poor piglet, running away from the military commissar with a agenda.

name: Kingdom Wars 4: Sultans & Kings
description: Lead your royal house and ascend the throne as a Sultan or a King! Rule one of the medieval nations of Europe, North Africa and the Middle East. Defend your lands from enemies both near and far. Build each of your towns and cities into a mighty stronghold and center of economic prosperity

name: Year 500
description: Year 500 is a third-person, hack-n-slash adventure game featuring swordplay, magic casting, and an engaging story set in a fantasy world. Reclaim your memory, oppose and defeat evil, and save the kingdom by any means necessary.

name: Violent Selection
description: Is Mr. Venturi just a subject of study, or is he something else? Violent Selection is a bloody top-down shooter where you may find this out by surviving a series of challenging levels from the T.R.A.U.M.A. Unnatural Selection Case Study #9.

name: Origin Unknown
description: Investigate the recently condemned High Rock Hotel in this mystery horror expedition. Solve the disappearance of your father as Lin Wei as she evades parasitic monsters and discovers clues to the truth of what truly transpired in this 1970's hotel.

name: Dippy & Chippy
description: Join forces with your best friend and embark on a thrilling adventure as the two-headed ogre duo, Dippy & Chippy, in the ultimate two-player couch coop game of exploring dungeons and discovering treasures!

name: Hyper Hentai Devil Hell
description: Hyper Hentai Devil Hell is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of hell of devil and multiple unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Illum
description: Embark on a heartwarming journey with your little light friend to solve puzzles and bring light to the mystical realm of Illum.

name: Laruaville Match 3 Puzzle
description: That's the first game in the Laruaville series! It has some new interesting Match 3 mechanics you won't see in other games, plus Mahjong ( try it! This mahjong is totally different from regular mahjongs! ) and some Spot The Difference scenes. Plus building the town.

name: Scrap Bolts
description: Accelerate across platforms, fly over ramps and jump on trampolines to recover all the lost pieces.

name: Brothel Simulator II
description: Brothel Simulator II is a simulation game in which you manage your own brothel. Employ girls, keep track of their needs, level up their skills, keep the bar well stocked and your clients will be back again and again.

name: Chicken Fight
description: Chickens, baseball bats and rockets, need more? Fight other player chickens in a fast-paced platformer fighter where you use the environment to defeat your enemies. Pick up fishing rods, jetpacks, net guns, and even other chickens. Also defeat an evil duck in story mode or create maps in the editor.

name: PumpKin Majo
description: Our pumpkin witch tries to avoid hitting the evil pumpkins and stay away from other enemies while collecting green orbs and trying to reach the highest score on halloween. So it takes a lot of effort to make the highest score on halloween.

name: The Plague: Kingdom Wars - Dead Rising
description: The Dead Rising DLC adds an optional Undead mode to The Plague: Kingdom Wars campaign. The millions infected with the Black Death will soon turn into an even deadlier plague, as hordes of undead aimlessly roaming Europe, destroying everything in their path.

name: Chronicles of Galdurvale
description: Guide Amelia Moonglow, a wide-eyed hunter with incredible power, as she journeys from Middleland to the floating isles of Sky World. Explore the lands of Galdurvale, utilizing her mystical armband to harness the elements and decimate her foes. Adventure and excitement await!

name: A Turnabout to El Dorado
description:
Taking place several months after the events of Spirit of Justice, Phoenix finds himself alone when he takes a rather strange -- and extremely hopeless case. With an uncooperative defendant, a staggering amount of evidence supporting the police's case, and a prosecutor that clearly has it in for him, how will Phoenix turn things around? Is there even any room for doubt?

Where does the truth lie?

In the hearts of the key players, all with their own secrets and motives?

Between the trees of the dense forest, the scene of a horrific murder?

Or perhaps, in the mythical city of gold that seems to be the connecting factor between the strange circumstances of the case -- El Dorado?

name: F-out
description: A futuristic racing video game for the Playdate console.

name: U4id
description:
You are heading to an exotic island (a large one with several cities/locations, not the beach and palms only type).
While on this island you run into quite a few girls.
You all have your own backstory to how you ended up there,
and there's a reason you're all there. u4ia tells the story of what's happening on that island,
the backstory to how you all got there, bonding with these people,
getting ready for something you don't even know will happen.
Try to befriend these girls and make the most of it.

name: Just Survive
description: The world is looking for a new hero!

name: Sudoku but it's on the MD
description: It's sudoku, and it's running on the Mega Drive.

name: Rotten Dinner
description:
It's such a beautiful evening. Won't you share it with me over a lovely dinner?
What is the main course, my sweetheart? Oh, it's a secret...

name: The Pizza
description:
You decide to hold a party and order a pizza.
What could possibly go wrong...

name: Zelda: Interconnected Strongholds
description: This hack has a small overworld, but it is filled to the brim with every item in the game along with 9 dungeons in total. Every single cave and house is redesigned, and there are a bunch of graphic edits and palette changes. As with 18 Hours Past, there’s kind of a story set in place but it’s not the main focus of the game. There are some custom events though that relate to the story, so the creator at least tried to put more of a story in.

name: Panic House
description: Panic House is a horror game that is sure to give players a thrilling and heart-pumping experience. As the player enters the game, they are immediately transported to an eerie and foreboding atmosphere. The visuals are dark and gloomy, with shadows lurking in every corner, and the sound effects are designed to keep the player on edge.

name: Nomad
description: A serene first-person 3D platformer where you use a magical rope to traverse the body of a dormant ancient colossus in order to heal its wounds and awaken it once again. Embark on a relaxing journey of melancholy to rekindle one of nature's long-lost wonders.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 05
description: Season 2: Episode 05 - Cowgirl Bebop! Peggy, eager for her best friend to return to a safer life, enlists Mini's help in transforming Peter back into a Loser.

name: Bottle
description: Bottle is a very short game in which you play as an alcoholic man of solitude.

name: All Idleness and Ephemera
description: Alternative universe version of "All Ashes and Illusions" where Yuel falls for Tavi.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Deluxe Edition
description: Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.

name: Pocket Pool: Adventure
description:
Explore new worlds and conquer new challenges!
In this DLC you will get 25 new levels with five ancient cultures themes.
Rediscover pocket pool by exploring the entire world in mini scale.

name: Pocket Pool: Complete Edition
description:
It's time for crazy Pool. Sit back and enjoy 75 unique tables. Fancy multiplayer with your friends? We have it - up to 4 players on one console!

The plan is simple: aim a cue ball, hit other balls and put them in a pocket. Here's the tricky part: the pool is a banana! Or a watermelon, or a castle, a pirate ship... you name it, we got it.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles - Istanbul
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles - New York
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles - Paris
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles - Sydney
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles - London
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles - Amsterdam
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Sexy Memory Puzzle: Spanking Girls
description: Solve the anime puzzles to reveal and collect pictures of a naughty mistress spanking her girlfriend, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match. Flip two cards, and if the numbers on them match, they will be removed from the board, revealing a unique image.

name: Save King
description: Carefully adjust the force so that the princess does not fall down from the maze to reach the 11th floor. Traps installed throughout the maze interfere with the princess, so it is easy to go to the beginning floor if you do something wrong.

name: Nightmare: Worlds Collide
description: Nightmare: Worlds Collide is a unique horror experience that follows Jessica Redford as she recalls her memories after a horrific event causes her to lose touch with reality. Throughout the experience you will be unravelling the mystery as she tries to escape her dark inner secrets.

name: NeverHome: Hall of Apathy
description: Use your wits to solve puzzles and escape from an abstract world in this hand-drawn atmospheric horror game

name: That Potato Game
description: Explore life as a potato and roll your way through the cozy, mystical home of Hilbert. Complete puzzles, gain abilities, and find hidden secrets within!

name: Rebound Gun
description: "Rebound Gun" is an indie game with shooting and bullet rebound as its main theme. In the game, players will play as the protagonist Hyakka, exploring the imaginative world during sleepless nights.

name: I Commissioned Some Dogs 2
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many dogs and bones as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ hidden objects, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Spiritless Ltd.
description: Do you sometimes hear scratching, scraping or rumbling noises? Then you might have a poltergeist in your home. But don’t panic. Spiritless Ltd. is here to help you and expel the ghost from your home.

name: Dreamy Trail
description: Welcome to Dreamy Trail, a captivating walking simulator that takes you on a peaceful journey through a mystical forest. Immerse yourself in the serene atmosphere as you explore the forest, collect items, and uncover hidden secrets.

name: Level Up: The Gamer Girls
description: The gamer girls have picked up some goodies, made themselves comfortable and are ready for a good game!

name: Camelot 2: The Holy Grail
description: A terrible disease has struck Queen Guinevere! The only thing that can save her is the Holy Grail. But the ancient artefact has long been lost somewhere in the expanses of Avalon. Can you manage to overcome all obstacles, find the Grail, and save the queen?

name: FatSheep Crisis
description: Fat Sheep Town has monsters! Use skills to defeat them. Plugins help warriors survive. Many maps have risks and rewards. Pick an occupation and weapons. Level up weapons. Combine skills, plugins and weapons. Defeat the villain!

name: BananaGuy
description: BananGuy returns for a new epic adventure! Collect "Power Coins" and explore goofy worlds in the ultimate search for the legendary golden banana!

name: Pizza Bar Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
description: Become the pizza magnate! Create the best pizza in town!

name: Horror Bundle: 3 in 1
description: Horror Bundle 3 in 1: Paratopic + Fatum Betula + Blood Breed

name: Tiny Dragon Story
description: Jump right into an epic adventure set in a 1-bit world. This Tiny Dragon is no pushover and will do anything in his quest to find the Wizard who stole his stuff.

name: Gruta
description: Unravel an enigmatic story and confront a monster

name: Slime Knight
description: Use an extendable slime arm to “dissolve”, punch, grab, and throw enemies in order to save your slime brethren and navigate through the decrepit insides of an ancient Worm in this top-down hoard battler.

name: Shelley's Haunted House
description: Shelley's Haunted House is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror Game based on the story of the Shelley's house which is a famous haunted location in the US known for the dark spirit of the lady in black.

name: Little Bo Reap
description: Little Bo Peep's sleepiness has led to all of her sheep being killed! Take revenge using powers of necromancy to summon undead flocks of sheep to defeat your foes. Each different flock can assist in your movement or your battles to defeat your foes in an untold number of ways!

name: These Doomed Isles: The First God
description:
These Doomed Isles: The First God is a prologue chapter of the main game, These Doomed Isles. Play as Cernunnos, the Celtic god of nature, and lead the Celtic civilisation to victory against waves of invaders, curses and more!

Raise land from the sea, build a settlement for your followers and provide them with the means to gather the resources they need to prosper. Expand from humble beginnings to a sprawling island chain with farms, factories, fortifications and more, as you discover ever more advanced buildings and strategies.

name: Dead Pedal
description: Dead Pedal is a 3rd person, action, open world driving game set in a fictional version of the Mojave desert, where your goal is to cause as much chaos and destruction as possible. Go out and explore the world's threats to get revenge for your fallen goldfish, Ted.

name: RagBrawl
description: Get ready to ragdoll in RagBrawl! Compete as a floppy Tuffling toy with up to 12 players online and show them your stuff in this chaotic party game!

name: Idol Showdown
description:
Idol Showdown is the definitive fan-made hololive fighting game experience, powered by rollback netcode. Engage in exciting duels as your favorite H=hololive talent and prove once and for all who the strongest idol is using the game’s easy-to-learn controls.

Pick up on this game’s easy-to-learn control scheme in no time to get straight into playing. Even hololive fans who are inexperienced with traditional fighting games can have fun!

Besto Games has been hard at work developing the game’s online rollback netcode to make the online experience as smooth as we can.

Explore the vast world of hololive from our roster of iconic hololive talents, with moves inspired by their most memorable moments and personality traits. Fight across the virtual world in lovingly recreated hololive locations. Jam out to remixes of your favorite hololive original songs while raising idol hell.

hololive talents are re-imagined as core fighting game archetypes with a unique twist. Bring chaos in the battlefield with flashy attacks and high-octane action.

name: Five Nights at Stalin
description: A horror game in which the main antagonist is Stalin himself, or rather his statue. The player must use all the resources given to him to stand up to the mighty foe, or else he will face either dismissal or something worse...

name: Garten of Banban 3
description: Embrace the horrors of Banban’s Kindergarten. Delve even deeper into the depths of the establishment that was left suspiciously empty. Try to survive the unexpected residents and continue the search for your child…

name: Retrocausality
description: Set in Akihabara between the years 2000-2069, Retrocausality follows a group of college students who survive an anomaly only to find themselves in the middle of a temporal war.

name: GeraScopia
description: When lost in the Depths, the only way to go is up. You will Escape- one way or another.

name: Project-X Zombie vs. Machine Gun
description: Project X is a funny little rpg zombie shooter, but no regular rpg maker game. The usual battle scenes are not used, you have to shoot the zombies with guns. This game is made for you if you like rpg maker games made different than they should. There is no real story, it's just a little fun game.

name: After Stream
description: After Stream is a first-person psychological horror game. You will take on the role of a streamer who returns home to stream, but something goes wrong..

name: Psionic Awake
description: Psionic Awake is a Roguelike game . Collect resources during the day and defend against monsters at night. It emphasizes any combination of weapons, talents, treasures and partners.

name: Trek to Yomi: Deluxe Edition
description:
Trek to Yomi: Deluxe Edition includes:

- Base Game
- Soundtrack CD
- 104 Page Artbook
- Ultimate Edition Box

name: Koakuma
description:
Koakuma is a play-and-earn MMO-ARPG packed with immersive combat mechanics set in a graphics-intensive metaverse.

Get token & NFT rewards as you fight in epic battles!

name: Piggy Gambit
description: Piggy Gambit is a game that harmoniously combines the elements of chess, box puzzles, and flow control into a coherent puzzle game about a piggy searching for the meaning to his life.

name: The Suits Have Gone Mad!
description: The Suits Have Gone Mad! is a brand-new episodic series where you unravel the mysteries behind the monopoly of Blake & Whitley Innovations and bring color into the world.

name: Death or Treat
description: “Death or Treat” is an action rogue-lite, Hack and Slash and 2D with traditional animations and handpainted environments.You will play as Scary, the owner of Ghost Mart. The Halloween spirit is missing. Join Scary to save HallowTown.

name: Trek to Yomi: Ultimate Edition
description: Trek to Yomi is an ultra-stylized cinematic action adventure that follows the enthralling story of Hiroki during his fall against the forces of evil. Experience his heroic return to make good on his failed promise to save the people he swore to protect.

name: Sea of Choices
description: With both immersive and life sim elements, plot out your day to day life in the shoes of Aura! In combat use turn-based tactics to employ a strategy that leads to victory! Or just chill out and collect records and read books!

name: Tetragun
description: Tetragun is a top-down shooter where you play as a stationary turret and defend yourself against waves of enemies. As you progress through the waves, you will acquire upgrades to help you keep up with the growing strength and numbers of your enemies. The arena is split into 4 quadrants, and your turret will only be able to aim within the confines of the quadrant it is currently in. To aim at enemies outside of your current quadrant, you'll need to enter rotate mode with RMB and click on the quadrant you would like to rotate to. The goal of the game is to make it as far as possible, and get the highest score you can.

name: Hexworld
description: Unusual Medieval Strategy.

name: Yowie
description: You just crashed your car in the remote Australian wilderness. You are injured and being stalked by a murderous Yowie. Will you escape with your life or fall like so many before you to the monster?

name: Temple Run+
description: This is a port of Temple Run exclusively for Apple Arcade that removes all the ads and microtransactions. This version also adds 4K support, new characters and weekly challenges.

name: Time Locker+
description: This is a port of Time Locker exclusively for Apple Arcade that removes all the ads and microtransactions.

name: Snake.io+
description: This is a port of Snake.io exclusively for Apple Arcade that removes all the ads and microtransactions.

name: Acrophobia
description: Sin descripción

name: Time to Belong
description: Episode with four medium-sized classic id-themed maps + custom start and end map. Mostly vanilla Quake with a few extras, comes with its own progs.dat. Based on previously released speedmaps (details in included readme).

name: Sonic Arena
description: Sonic Arena is a Fighting game that was finished after 17 years.

name: School Booster
description: In the School Booster, you will play the role of being a parent raising your girl to an adult (18). her grow-up journey will come from heaven, baby, kid, teenager, these four sages. And each stage has slightly different playing mechanics.

name: Shrine of the Silver CyberPrimate
description: Shrine of the Silver CyberPrimate is a 6+? map techno-mesoamerican adventure from the Diabolical Broadcasting Korporation, serving as a semi-spiritual successor to DBP09: Legends of the Hidden Tech. The project targets ZDoom 2.8.1 but has also been tested with recent GZDoom versions, especially 4.10.0. As with previous DBKs, the goal here is to use well-established ZDoom features to suggest a hypothetical '90s game engine made up of bits of Doom, Build, Quake, and Hexen. Since our goal is not to push the bleeding edge of modern source ports, effort has been made to keep the set playable on lower-spec machines.

name: Fortnite: Captain Hypatia's Level Up Quest Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga Starkiller Update
description: For the uninitiated, Luke Starkiller is an early version of Luke Skywalker, as portrayed in concept artwork by Ralph McQuarrie, the designer and illustrator who helped to define the iconic look and style at the Star Wars universe.

name: Virtual Families Cook Off: Chapter 2 - Farm Life
description: Fire up the grill, mix your marinades, become a chef and start your very own Cook-Off now! Virtual Families Cook Off combines time management with home renovation and decoration! Serve your family and the whole neighborhood!

name: Escape the Prison: 3 Days to Freedom
description: A graphic adventure game where you must escape prison in 3 days by making decisions.

name: I Love Finding Birds: Collector's Edition
description: Enjoy amazing and colourful birds in new hidden object adventure!

name: Hola! Reversi
description: Flip the board, change the game: Hola! Reversi on Nintendo Switch

name: Disney SpellStruck
description: ourney to the Isles of Tiles with beloved Disney and Pixar characters and take on challenging crossword-style games in Disney Spellstruck! Flex your skills with Mickey Mouse, Tiana, Stitch, and others in a crossword-style adventure. Play with friends in online versus mode, complete daily challenges, and test your power as you claim the top spot on the leaderboards!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate
description: TMNT Splintered Fate - Unleash the Turtles in a rogue-like quest to rescue Splinter from the Foot Clan! Master ninja skills, unite in bodacious co-op gameplay, and conquer iconic NYC locales.

name: Cityscapes: Sim Builder
description: Take on the role as Mayor and build carefully thought out systems to protect the health and happiness of your citizens. As you watch your city expand, the stunning 3D architecture will take your breath away. Experiencing the game on Apple Arcade means your experience will not be interrupted by adverts or pay walls, so you really can build your dream city.

name: What the Car?
description: You’re a car with legs! Race through hundreds of unique levels: jump, fly with jetpacks, climb tall buildings, deliver packages, and so pretty much everything you can’t do in a normal racing game.

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Anniversary Edition
description: A year after the world premiere of the newest adventures of Kao the Kangaroo, the Anniversary Edition is finally here!

name: Adventures of Ben: Rabbit Run
description: World of Valentardia will not let you get bored for a second! Adventures will require the hero to be not only determined but also to be faithfully accepted.

name: Tamas Awakening
description: Tamas Awakening is a 2D visual novel where you play as a young psychologist who obtains a mysterious power to hypnotize people. You use this power to fuck all the girls around you, especially those who live with you. This game features lots and lots of impregnation and breeding dirty talk.

name: Brave Bubble Heart
description: In Brave Bubble Heart, you'll face strange creatures and solve puzzles while saving as many souls as you can that are lost in the abyss. Your life is your ammunition. Do not die!

name: A Rocket's Intensity
description: Experience high-speed, multiplayer battles across various environments in this action-packed game. Use rockets to take down enemy UFOs and conquer multiple challenging levels. Upgrade your ship and unlock powerful weapons to dominate the skies and emerge victorious in this epic war.

name: Unnatural: Season Two
description: Raise a new organization from the ashes of the SRT and guide Silver Cross Incorporated to protect the innocent from the darker side of humanity.

name: Lords and Tactics
description: Here, you will start from scratch and meet like-minded comrades. With wisdom and courage, you set out on a journey to conquer and unite the lands. Use the Strategy system and deploy Frontline, Center, and Rearguard units to fight your opponents in small-scale skirmishes.

name: Fursona Festival
description: Wander into the carnival of a giant magical dragon lady, where nobody ever leaves unchanged! Answer an extensive list of questions disguised as mini games as you explore the carnival grounds to discover what animal spirit lives inside you.

name: Sorcerer's Mid-month Exam
description: Step into an exhilarating fantasy world adventure where you'll confront a series of spine-chilling monsters. In this astonishing VR game, you'll need to maintain unwavering focus, utilizing your unique and powerful skills to defeat these formidable adversaries one by one!

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Bend the Roo'les
description: “Bend the Roo'les” features 5 new levels, each with their own unique twist on the formula of Kao the Kangaroo: new perspectives, a retro-inspired design, and the continuation of Kao versus the Eternal World!

name: JanduSoft Games Bundle Vol. 1
description: 4 thrilling games, 1 unbeatable bundle!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Prison Underground
description: Solve riddles and break out from a huge underground facility!

name: Top PUA
description: This is an LVG, a GALGAME, a visual novel, a super hilarious game. This story happend in Mainland China. In this game, our protagonist Willie dated a top pick-up artist Lilie. Although she is pretty young, but she know everything about dating with a man.

name: Golden Idol Mysteries: The Spider of Lanka
description: The Spider of Lanka begins in 1741, one year before the first scenario in The Case of the Golden Idol, and uncovers the awful origins of this five-decade tale of betrayal, greed, ambition and death. Set in the fictional Kingdom of Lanka, this DLC offers three brand new scenarios that will demand the utmost of your deduction powers to unravel.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: 200 Days Zombie Apocalypse
description: You must survive a Zombie-infested world.

name: Project: InfoGrid
description: Project InfoGrid is 2.5d scifi rocket game. You are tasked with maneuvering through tight obstacles to reach the other end of each level. Starting simple but progressively becoming more unnatural as you progress through the tests. You'll need to adapt when to be patient or quick. Best of luck pilot.

name: Aphotic Descent
description: In Aphotic Descent, you play as a diver whose submarine crashed at the bottom of the ocean. With no other option for survival, you must make your way to a nearby underwater research facility facing terrifying creatures, all while descending deeper and deeper...

name: Open Spaces SE
description: Skylar is an student with anxiety. Walter is a farmer with social anxiety and PTSD. Jessica is a programmer with anxiety and agoraphobia. Li Wei is an technologist with intense anxiety. Navigate their stories, learn how they move through the world, and about methods of treatment and recovery.

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Breakup!
description: Meet a diverse cast of 9 cute crossdressing characters as they challenge you in brick-breaking arcade action! Score points to unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: Guardians Survival
description: Survive against waves of attackers in this roguelike survival shoot em up tower defence. Fight for survival, pick your guardian and choose from powerful upgrade paths. Is there enough time to survive and activate the portal before the timer runs out?

name: The Shooting Range 3D: Shooting Gallery Simulator
description: Shooting range is a great way to practice your shooting skills and improve your accuracy!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Fever
description: Jigsaw Puzzle Fever is a single player game that is fun for all the family.

name: Drink and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Hippy Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Blondes
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: My Summer Adventure: Memories of Another Life - Day 1
description: A strange incident turns the life of an ordinary young man upside down when, having fallen asleep on a regular train commute, he wakes up in another country... in a body of a Japanese student! An unforgettable summer adventure awaits, promising many fateful meetings and momentous occasions.

name: AFL 23
description: AFL 23 is the most authentic video game football experience to date. Featuring the fully licensed 2023 AFL Premiership and AFL Women’s competitions and over 30 detailed stadiums, it’s time to play footy for real.

name: ToyBox Puzzle
description: These toys are all over the place! Arrange and organize the mess by fitting everything inside the grid in this relaxing and colorful puzzle game with over 100 levels that will test your critical thinking skills.

name: Endless Monday: Dreams and Deadlines
description: "Endless Monday: Dreams and Deadlines" - In this short branching visual novel story, Penny, a mild-mannered corporate grunt, pulls an all-nighter at the office in an effort to finish her project on time while overcoming distractions from coworkers, space aliens, imaginary friends, and herself.

name: Bad Piggies 2
description: Unleash your creativity and get ready to build the ultimate driving/flying/crashing machine! Cross the finish line in vehicular challenges full of arcade action and high speed hijinks with yours truly - the Bad Piggies!

name: Room of Depression
description: "Same encounter, different world." Moon is a young woman who lives an ordinary city life as an office worker. However, because she suffers from depression, she reacts and deals with things in a way that is very different from regular city folk.

name: Mia and the Dragon Princess
description: A live-action, interactive action movie following Mia, a plucky barmaid whose life is thrown into chaos when a mysterious woman turns up at her workplace, on the run from a group of violent thugs and unable to speak English.

name: SGS NATO's Nightmare
description: What if the Warsaw Pact had attacked NATO in the mid-1980s. Or the other way around? Study this titanic conflict, within its most emblematic theater, Germany and Central Europe. Will you be able to achieve your goals without escalating into an uncontrollable nuclear conflict?

name: Press Lex to Metaverx
description: Following the events of his first adventure, Lex is now the busy owner of the Truffle Shuffle. However, the space-time remains open and an easy shortcut ends on a big problem: a breach in his own Metaverse. Lex needs to explore it and help his friends to prove his existence was never a mistake!

name: Ravenlok
description: Ravenlok's life takes a turn for the unexpected when she stumbles through a magical mirror into a troubled kingdom. Explore fantastical realms, meet mad characters and defeat dark monsters to end the Caterpillar Queen’s reign of terror. Your destiny awaits in an action-packed, coming of age adventure.

name: The Last Human is a Biker
description: The Last Human is a Biker is a few hours of pure entertainment. In this 2D shooter you play as John, the last human, and unleash his fury in his quest of vengeance! With unlimited item synergies, make the choices that will allow you to survive against countless swarms of aliens!

name: Knight Crawlers
description: Knight Crawlers is a dungeon crawling ARPG with physics based ragdoll combat. Each crawl is made unique through dozens of skill cards to choose from. Hunt for loot, craft powerful equipment, and fight your way back home through strange worlds. How deep can you crawl through the endless realms?

name: Metal Mutation
description: In a not-so-distant future taken over by companies and technology, a Cyborg and an AI fight together to save mankind from nanoviruses. Play alone or as a team of 4 players in this Post-Cyberpunk Action Roguelike Dungeon Crawler!

name: Propagation: Paradise Hotel
description: Live an intense VR survival horror adventure with gripping storytelling, in which you will explore dark environments, make terrifying encounters and get your adrenaline pumping. Will you find your way out of the Paradise Hotel alive?

name: Remnants of the Rift
description: A real-time roguelike action game where time is on your side. Play, pause and plan in a stylish retro-future invaded by another dimension, and ride the frequencies between worlds to discover the secrets of a new reality.

name: This Means Warp
description: Traverse the universe and fight strategic, real-time battles alongside your friends in This Means Warp - an intense cooperative roguelike game. Upgrade your ship, take down individual enemy subsystems, and adapt your strategies in a constantly changing fight for survival.

name: Era of Celestials
description: The next-generation sound and graphics beyond the host, take you personally feel the magnificent turmoil of the magic continent!Wings feathering star, attributes soar to activate a new appearance; more "war god hall" blood competition, PK king race strong, free combat, fame and fortune!

name: Kikstart: Off-Road Simulator
description: Classic motorcycle racing game from 1985 developed by Shaun Southern (Mr Chip Software). Game was released for C64, ZX Spectrum and Atari 8-bit.

name: Ping
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Island 2: Red’s Demise Katana
description: Slice through the zombie horde with the Red's Demise Katana, which earns you a temporary damage boost with every slay.

name: Dead Island 2: Expansion Pass
description: Dive back into the epic horror pulp adventure of Dead Island 2 with our Expansion Pass. Brace yourself for mayhem as you uncover more of Hell-A, with brand-new missions, caches of lethal weapons, skill cards to master, fresh fits, and all the zombies you can slay.

name: Modules
description: Modules is a VR art experience by Maxim Zhestkov, where architecture, sculpture, film, and music blend together to immerse viewers into the artist's world.

name: Seek the Discrepancy
description: Sin descripción

name: War Tank Machine Battle Vehicle Simulator
description: War Tank Machine is an action-packed game that puts players in the driver's seat of a powerful military tank, ready to take on enemy forces on the battlefield. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, players will experience the adrenaline rush of warfare as they engage in explosive tank battles across different terrains and landscapes.

name: Bubble Monsters
description: Bubble Monsters is a classic bubble shoot game.

name: Rocket Swing
description: Swing the rocket to the right direction to not hit the barriers or the stars. Fly the highest as you can.

name: Idle Champions: Witchlight Nixie Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Nixie (if you don't already have them) Witchlight Nixie Skin An exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Nixie 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Nixie Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Idle Champions: Vacation Dungeon Master Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Dungeon Master (if you don't already own them) Vacation Dungeon Master Skin An Epic Feat for Dungeon Master 7 Gold Dungeon Master Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card

name: Idle Champions: Lord of Waterdeep Omin Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Omin Dran (if you don't already own them) Lord of Waterdeep Omin Skin An Epic Feat for Omin 7 Gold Omin Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card

name: Return to Abyss: Multidimensional Gift
description: This gift pack is a free DLC, and more content will be added in the future. Currently contains skins and dynamic portraits of 3 different characters

name: Drone Delivery Despair
description:
An apocalypse has occurred in the world, because of which people are forced to stay in their homes forever. The only way to receive and send resources between houses is cargo drones. You are a cargo drone whose task is to deliver packages from one point to another. Travel through a gigantic city filled with Soviet buildings in various weathers.

The game is made in a gloomy monochrome style with a gloomy atmosphere. Explore the city and deliver packages calmly, there are no screamers, monsters and so on in the game.

name: Kalevania
description: Kalevania is a retro action platformer loosely based on Finnish mythology. Fight with bare hands, sword, axe, bow, and 11 runic weapons. With 50+ enemy types and collectibles, enjoy a full retro gaming experience! Play as Väinämöinen and relive classic console gaming!

name: Little Postman
description: Puzzle game where you rotate islands to find your way around different archipelagos.

name: Silica
description: Silica is a crossover of FPS and RTS where up to 3 factions battle for control over the planet of Baltarus. Lead from above as commander, or experience the action first-hand, either alone, or with friends. Join one of two human armies, or hunt them down as the territorial aliens.

name: Beach Gas Gas
description: Beach Gas Gas is a high-speed driving game that is all about adrenaline and excitement.

name: Insert Rich Family Name
description: As one of the surviving members of a wealthy family, navigate a treacherous web of lies, deceit, and suspicion to identify the killer and claim your inheritance. But with a killer on the loose, you must be careful not to become the next victim.

name: Killbug
description: Killbug is a fast-paced, first-person movement shooter set in an endless arena. Slash and shoot your way through hordes of ravenous insects, mastering fluid aerial movement mechanics as you fight for glory on the leaderboards.

name: Be Frugal
description: Be Frugal is a bus stop design simulation for a growing city. Draw lines between stops and run buses. As new stops open, redraw your lines to keep them active. Decide carefully where you will use your limited resources.

name: Spaceship Racer: Portal
description: Spaceship Racer: Portal is an acade retro endless runner in pixel style with crazy "spaceships"

name: Samira: Taken From Time
description: Transported back in time, you must help Tiki, an ancient mech beetle, escape the apocalypse. Your puzzle solving skills will be put to the test as you attempt to collect the fragmented pieces of his tablet which will empower him with the ability to stop any and all world-ending events.

name: Forest Fire
description: Be the Forest Fire and burn everything in sight! Dodge bullet-hell rain clouds, rivers, and firefighters in this roguelite destruction fest. Each pixel is physically simulated to spread your flame far and wide. Only YOU can start Forest Fires.

name: Jenni's Dong has got it Goin' On: The Jenni Trilogy
description: Jenni is an intersex bimbo bombshell who is always up for thrills and squeals. Famed artist, Doxy's most popular character comes to life in this interactive narrative!

name: Color Pals
description: A fun puzzle game where your objective is to get to the exit with the same matching color! Be careful though, you can only touch the same colored blocks that you are. Jump around, collect colored bolts to help complete the level, and avoid spiked enemies trying to kill you!

name: Starwalker: Into the Cylinder
description: Starwalker is an upcoming Survival-MMORPG taking place far into into the future in a space cylinder.

name: Tape To Tape
description: Tape to Tape is a unique roguelite hockey game where every choice matters on your journey to build the ultimate hockey team. Choose your path, hire unique players, discover synergies between them, find new abilities, bribe the referees or visit the blademaster while you progress toward the major leagues.

name: Super Dungeon Maker
description:
Create & Play the dungeons of your dreams
Create and share your very own dungeons, then play a nearly infinite number of highly creative, trap-ridden dungeons made by other creators from all over the world.

name: Tiny Life
description: In Tiny Life, you control a set of people that live together in a household. You take care of their daily needs, build their skills, forge new relationships... or just mess up their entire life in whatever way you can think of!

name: Saikoro Saiko: Promises
description:
“Someday — Someday, until this happy dream gets shattered.”

Two short stories. A sequel to Saikoro Saiko that reveals what happens to Metarou and Saiko. And a prequel to Saikoro Saiko that shows us the story about a promise between two girls, Nana and Saiko.

name: Deliver to When You Came
description: Deliver the meal. Don't become one yourself. An open-ended puzzle platformer based around physics and AId

name: Constellation Courier
description:
Explore the stars as you make deliveries for folks all across the galaxy in Constellation Courier!

Play as a mail courier tasked with helping the world’s creatures, big and small, communicate with each other across the vast expanse of space. Uncover their stories along the way as you fly amongst the planets and learn more about their journeys through time.

name: Unread Messages
description: Help texts get to their destinations by drawing connections between cell towers. This is the Ludum Dare 53 version of the game.

name: Goodbye Cendrillon
description:
After putting on pink lipstick and changing into nice clothes... I felt like I could become your ideal self.

An unrequited BL visual novel.

name: Air Delivery
description: You’re a sky-island delivery worker delivering mail to all the nearby islands. Everything runs smoothly until the letters suddenly aren’t being delivered. Find all of the letters and deliver them to their recipients. Maybe they’ll give you something as a thank you.

name: Special Delivery
description: Embark on an exhilarating puzzle-solving adventure as you transport a mysterious box through rooms filled with conveyor belts, pistons, and cranes.

name: Claw Express
description: Sin descripción

name: Touch to Fate: Occult Romance
description:
"I can see his memory when I touch him! I should steal memories if I want the truth..!"

In 'Touch to Fate', you should uncover the hidden truths of Devon Island University!
The ending of the story depends on your choices...

When you touch someone, the curse is triggered!
You can see the other people's memories.

At Devon Island University, only the top 1% of the elite attend, there are clues related to 'your' parents' deaths! Discover the despicable secrets and hidden truths here.

name: Duke Burger
description: After saving mankind, Duke Nukem retired. He opened a little restaurant, Duke Burger. And now he is an honest businessman.

name: Bloody Woman
description: A young man accepts a job in a laundry in the late hours. But he discovers that something terrible has happened there and his life is in danger.

name: Rain on their Parade!
description:
Side-scrolling rain shooting (?) game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 53.

You’re a rain delivery cloud at Cloud Academy, but you’re on your way to flunking the year!

(Nobody told you that raining cats and dogs wasn’t meant to be literal...)

Pass these rainy assignments or you’ll be stuck on golf course sprinkler duty all summer!

name: Chotto xx na Watashi no Nichijou: Kiki Dasshutsu!? Gyakuten no Nazotoki Life
description:
Save the heros from these unfortunate pictures!
A simple, touch based time killing escape game

Somethings happening in these ordinary bright, yet sad, illistrations
A hidden object game where you aim to seek out a solution to these "Not-so-sad" dangers!

name: Pokipet
description: Create a group pet with your friends, family, or co-workers and give your pet the best life possible.

name: Isha no Mahou Toshoshitsu
description: Isha's Magical Library is an indie roguelike game in Japanese, published in 2023. It is free to play.

name: Niatang
description: A short visual novel taking place in a cyberpunk setting affected by global warming, discussing the topic of waste management.

name: Ravenhaul
description:
Queen Isadora III needs a high performing avian delivery service, and you are the right one to make her happy!

Get birds, get patrons, get contracts - Work hard, peck hard, enjoy your hard earned kernels, that's how we roll in bird county.

name: Gobliiins5
description: A great adventure in 2d for all ages. 16 big levels full of puzzles.

name: Unusual Night Shift
description:
How bad could a night shift end up?

In this game, you will play as a bouncer for a really exclusive (maybe illegal) underground night club. You are tasked to decide who is welcome, and who is better off searching for another place to have a drink. Everything should go smoothly, until a small mysterious package appears.

This short horror game contains three unique endings.

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Robin Hood
description:
Robin Hood and his outlaws excel at ranged attacks and robbing their opponents!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Robin Hood - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Sherwood Forest
description:
Sherwood Forest - the royal forest in Nottinghamshire, savvy melee fighters can take down even the most skilled ranged attackers!

This DLC unlocks Sherwood Forest - a map dedicated for 1v1 games!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Bigfoot
description:
Bigfoot and his pal, the Jackalope, crash through the forest for quick attacks before disappearing like a figment of the mind!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Bigfoot - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Sherlock Holmes
description:
Sherlock, with the trusty Watson by his side, schemes and calculates to ensure victory!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Sherlock Holmes - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Yukon
description:
Yukon - wild and mountainous territory, the Yukon makes for a tight fight - beware of getting trapped in a trail loop!

This DLC unlocks Yukon - a map dedicated for 1v1 games!

name: EmyLiveShow: S&M Story
description: Discover the depths of your fetishes and kinks with EmyLiveShow stars Emy and Nia! Spend amazing hours in the company of beautiful v-tubers and find out their secrets!

name: Laya's Horizon
description:
Master the art of flying. Dive off mountains, weave across forests and glide over rivers to unlock new abilities as you explore a vast, peaceful world.

Use the ancient power of the Windfolk’s enchanted capes to hone your skills, take on challenges and fly through obstacle courses that will make your heart soar. Explore an expansive island in this open world wingsuit adventure.

name: Detectives United: Origins - Collector's Edition
description: Join Mystery Trackers' Agent Brown, Haunted Hotel's James Blackthorne, and Grim Tales' Anna Gray as they join forces to stop The Collector's evil scheme.

name: Welcome To... Chichester OVN: Omnibus Edition
description: Welcome To... Chichester OVN: Omnibus Edition contains OVN 1, 2 and 3 in one program, with updated in-game GUI, full stops added and slight story enhancements.

name: Criminal Archives: Alphabetic Murders DLC
description: Are the murders of three different people connected? Or are we dealing with three different incidents? Cunning and logic are your best weapons in solving this case!

name: Arcade Archives: Tecmo Knight
description: Kick the beastman away!

name: As Crônicas de Mar Céu
description: Game inspired by the book "As Crônicas de Mar Céu". It is turn-based, adventure and fantasy, played by different characters in a vast world with magic, wars and animations. It has from its comic and humorous side, to its more serious and emotional side. A game made for everyone!

name: Grape Juice City
description: A friendly but competitive couch party game for all ages! Play as tropical birds competing to splash pedestrians with your team’s juice in this match-based party game. Bounce around a tropical metropolis, gather fruit and recyclables, craft juicy drinks, and splash the people of Grape Juice City!

name: Criminal Archives: Alphabetic Murders - Collector's Edition
description: Are the murders of three different people connected? Or are we dealing with three different incidents? Cunning and logic are your best weapons in solving this case!

name: Magic Toenail
description: Magic Toenail is a strategic wizarding roguelite where every step you take is a tactical maneuver! You shoot when you move and move when you shoot, so even the simplest enemy encounters will quickly become high-stakes puzzles!

name: Wandering Skies
description: Navigate through the Sky Lands and uncover its secrets to restore their lost harmony. In this first person platformer, use your abilities to reach the end of each level. Observation and skill are the keys to success !

name: The Stoevi Curse
description: Unravel the mystery of The Stoevi Curse, a first-person survival horror game set in rural post-Communist Bulgaria. Protect your farm, save your family.

name: Ducklyte
description: Ducklyte is a top-down shooter with roguelite elements where you play as a constipated little duck trying to stay alive as long as possible in a randomly generated farm with progressively stronger enemies.

name: Charged: RC Racing - Starter Edition
description: Charged: RC Racing is all about speed and making use of random items. Drive RC Cars in different locations and use items to defeat your opponents.

name: Green New Deal Simulator
description: Achieve zero emissions and full employment in this casual card-driven game.

name: Pixel Paint 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Derpy Dino
description: Derpy Dino is a game where you are the last dinosaur alive. You try your best to survive and keep the dinosaurs from becoming extinct but be aware... meteors are crashing down.

name: Expel
description: You become a ghost and surprise, attack, and curse the ghost investigators who come to your house. You can scare them however you like, and later replay the game from the investigator's point of view to see what kind of ghost you were.

name: Survival Shooter
description: This is a first-person shooter game where you use various weapons to defeat enemies and explore the world. You must manage your health, use limited resources wisely, in order to survive in this challenging world.

name: Pigeon Strike
description: This cute casual game is offering you the chance to relax and get some lazy revenge while you test your reflexes and expand your poop reign.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Random Animals 3
description: Puzzles of random animals!

name: Age of Wonders 4: Premium Edition
description: Age of Wonders 4 Premium Edition gives you access to the base game, as well as the Expansion Pass. The Expansion Pass will grant you the first two major expansions and two content packs.

name: Clausum
description: Clausum is a first person psychological horror game that delivers a terrifying and immersive experience. Solve puzzles, explore different locations and discover true horrors. You have nothing to defend yourself and the house is looking for the next victim.

name: Redfall: Bite Back Edition
description: The Bite Back Edition includes the Base Game, Redfall Hero Pass, Throwback Outfit Pack, Laser Beam multi-weapon skin and the Tactical Knife Stake attachment.

name: Age of Wonders 4
description:
Rule a fantasy realm of your own design in Age of Wonders 4! Explore new magical realms in Age of Wonders’ signature blend of 4X strategy and turn-based tactical combat. Control a faction that grows and changes as you expand your empire with each turn.

Triumph Studios’ award-winning strategy series has emerged into a new age, evolving the game’s iconic empire building, role-playing, and warfare to the next level. A new storytelling event system and hugely customizable empires provide an endlessly replayable experience, where each game adds a new chapter to your ever-growing saga.

Powerful Wizard Kings have returned to the realms to reign as gods among mortals. Claim and master the Tomes of Magic to evolve your people, and prepare for an epic battle that will determine the ages to come.

name: Showgunners
description: As a contestant on a brutal reality game show of the future, you must survive a deadly urban environment packed with lethal traps, confounding puzzles, and murderous, heavily armed psychopaths. Turn-based combat in hand crafted levels, built for entertainment.

name: Lander Odyssey
description: With limited fuel and several dangers lurking, use your skills to rescue astronauts trapped in various unique places on the strange planet. It won't be an easy rescue.

name: Redfall
description: Redfall is an open-world, co-op FPS from Arkane Austin, the award-winning team behind Prey and Dishonored. Continuing Arkane’s legacy of carefully crafted worlds and immersive sims, Redfall brings the studio’s signature gameplay to this story-driven action shooter.

name: Hand In Hand
description: An atmospheric platformer with co-op play in single-player mode. Immerse yourself in the ethnic world of two heroes, solve puzzles and overcome obstacles together, explore the fairy forest and other locations, help each other in battles against bosses.

name: Lycoris;Lastwords
description: Deliver three recently departed souls to the afterlife -- and keep their thoughts comforted. As best you can, at least.

name: Brawl Stars: The Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft x Crocs: Choose Your Mode
description: Minecraft x Crocs: Choose Your Mode was a promotional browser-mobile game that was made as a part of a collaboration deal between Crocs and Minecraft. The game featured 2 augmented reality games based on Minecraft, Crocs Creator and Crocs Crossing.

name: 5-Star
description: Yongbok works delivering food for the 5-STAR Restaurant (which his boss says it’s a 5-star Michelin even though there’s no such thing). He must travel to various locations and deliver food boxes to various houses. But he must be careful, for there are mischievous creatures who want to take food boxes from his hands.

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Match
description:
Plants vs Zombies meets Match 3 puzzles - This ain’t your garden variety match 3 game!

Grow your match 3 puzzle skills and join Dave on a totally new Plants vs Zombies adventure game. Those wacky zombies are dead set on making life in Neighborville rather dim. It’s time to let your matching puzzle skills shine as bright as the Sun -- because you’ll need to collect it, recruit your favorite leafy friends, stem the tide of yet another quirky zombie horde, and save Neighborville… you know the drill!

name: Debasing Grounds
description: Debasing Grounds is an adult web-browser-based RPG and social simulator set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players can play it online or download the game. The game is compatible with various platforms, including Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android.

name: Ziona Quest
description:
The Year is 1023, the call went out for brave souls to come join the quest to help humanity free themselves and return the Earth to her true heavenly glory...

...you answered.

WELCOME BRAVE SOUL!!

Ziona Quest is a frantic platformer where skill, strategy and quick reactions are essential if you are to complete your mission.

name: Paranormal Inc.
description: After looking for a job for a long time, you started as an operator in a company named "Paranormal Inc." You will watch live CCTV footage and report the anomalies you see.

name: Address1
description: 2D style shoot'em up in which close combat is the primary attack method. With two large swords in her hands, cut her way through enemy bullets and enemy units in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Goodwad
description: GOODWAD is a MBF21-compatible megawad by Emma Essex (msx2plus). It is a compilation of speedmaps of various types, including slaughter maps, platforming maps, joke maps, and more experimental pieces.

name: A Message For The Stone King
description:
You have a gravely important message to deliver to your leader, the powerful and legendary Stone King, about an enemy army approaching the kingdom's borders. However, after many years of firm, decisive leadership and uncontested rule it will be difficult to make him hear you.

Dig your way out of the dungeon and try to find out why the king won't believe a word you say.

name: Serum Run
description: A dogsled Oregon Trail-like originally made in 48 hours.

name: Build-A-Delivery
description: You take the role of a delivery driver in a small desert village, moving packages from one villager to another and getting paid for it. Unfortunately the company car is quite bare bones and it's your job to install parts to it and figure out how to carry packages in it, essentially building your own delivery car.

name: Immortal Warfare
description: Immortal Warfare is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz

name: 2D Dogfight
description: Sin descripción

name: Drive.RS
description:
Welcome to the Drive.RS public beta!

Huge, fun, without limits - the biggest, best, most realistic open world racing game on mobile.

name: Beep Boop
description: Play as Boop - the local courier driver. Help others get their packages safely to their establishments. Get money, buy flowers for your wife and maybe even buy a new car!

name: Shape Shipper
description:
Welcome to shape shipper!

You have been tasked to construct items out of raw materials to be shipped off to customers! Try to keep up with the demand!

name: Super Kids Racing: Snow Edition
description:
Super Kids Racing: Snow Edition offers wide variety of challenges with many different types of vehicles to choose from. Players will love to complete these challenges with their friends in split-screen multiplayer mode.

Get ready for ultimate racing adventure with your friends and family.

name: Caged
description:
An English Yume Nikki fangame created by MichaelaGlass.

Keiji is a young boy stuck in his small, unkept room; unwilling to leave it for a reason he doesn't want to think about. The only way he can escape the room is by going to bed and exploring his dreams. Explore his unconscious to uncover effects and help him escape his reality...

name: Dumb Ways to Die 4
description:
Dumb Ways to Die 4 delivers even more of what you love: exciting and challenging minigames, new areas to explore, all your favorite Beans to rescue - and much, much more!

Challenge your friends and family to see who can survive the longest and become the ultimate champion of Dumb Ways to Die!

name: Obey Her or Else
description:
You’ve just landed a spot at one of the most prestigious and costly schools in the country, but things take a turn when your father messes up at his job. Despriate to maintain your chance at a good future, your father agrees to send you away as a live-in tutor for the daughter of a billionaire!

Things only get crazier when you realize the girl you’ll be tutoring is one of your classmates—the laziest and most antisocial of them all! She doesn’t take kindly to being tutored by a commoner and couldn’t care less about you. Can you survive this new life and keep up with school, or will you be crushed under the heels of your new mistress?

name: Hexa Puzzle Saga
description: Help your kingdom survive crises, and grow your wealth through managing your ruler's powers and solving hex puzzles.

name: Zelda: Meadow of Shadows
description: Meadow of Shadows is a short hack of the Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past made under an 18 hour timer as apart of a challenge between myself, JaredBrian, Letterbomb, and Zarby89. The game features three dungeons and a final gauntlet area. It showcases the abilities of the ZScream editor and acts as a prequel to the upcoming Oracle of Secrets ROM hack.

name: Light the Way
description:
"Welcome to Lion's Pride. You've come here to apply as one of our servers, is that correct?"...

It's your first day as a server at the cabaret, and you've already been asked out by five charming young men!! Suave, energetic, affectionate, gentle, or carefree… which do you prefer?

name: Stroke The Beaver
description:
Beavers are interesting creatures, they are both wet and furry, due to being in the water so much. Many of us have never stroked one before, but now if your chance to touch one for the first time.

Well, you can't really touch one, but you can at least make it look like you have a beaver in your very own home.

name: The Paper Arcade
description: The Paper Arcade is a collection of classic arcade-style games with a unique drawing and sketchbook aesthetic. Enjoy fast-paced, high-score chasing action, challenging puzzles, and casual games. Each game is brought to life with stunning hand-drawn graphics. Addictive, retro-style gaming fun!

name: SimpliCity
description: A sandbox game about building a city without all those hassle from complicated systems.

name: The Flying Feathers
description: Nia accidentally goes into her best friend—Alice's past, the only way to escape and go back to the real world is to help Alice to solve all her problems. When you can go back to the past, do you want to do everything you can to save what you've lost?

name: Bom Bom Bombian
description: Easy-to-use bomb action! Throw bombs and mine Bomcoin! Aim! Bomberhead Champion!

name: Tower Tactics: Celestial Dawn
description: First expansion for Tower Tactics! Comes with 40+ new cards, 40+ new trinkets, 4 new decks, 4 new enemies and 40 new maps!

name: Raimodula
description: Raimodula is a dynamic arcade platformer, featuring customizable characters and randomized progression. Unlock habilities, fight modular enemies and navigate surreal environments with polished controls and intense gameplay!

name: Paws of Coal
description:
Paws of Coal is a cozy, slow-paced detective adventure with gameplay influenced by the scientific method – quests are solved by connecting evidence. If you get it right, the mystery is solved. If you get it wrong, everyone could be in danger. So, tread carefully.

In the game, you play as Charles, a scholar on a mission sent by His Majesty (the lion king Lav) to help the critters of The Burrows where the outbreak is on the rise. Is it dangerous, or just a mere nuisance? It is up to Charles to find out what is going on.

But there would be problems on his path, both scientific and social.

The Burrows is a mining town, and miners are on a strike
There is no cure for the outbreak, and productivity is suffering. The miners won't tolerate the current scenario and are on strike. The problem? The foreman of The Burrows isn't having any of it and wants to shut down the strike. Unless Charles finds a creative solution.

Paws of Coal is a short, stand-alone game set in the larger Trip the Ark Fantastic universe that is currently in development in Gamechuck. Paws of Coal offers around 3 to 4 hours of gameplay (depending on your play style), and even multiple endings.

The investigation is solved by talking to each resident of The Burrows, finding the clues in the environment, making a lot of notes, and connecting the dots (literally) using the interface in Charles' journal.

When you're sure you got it right - submit the report, and... hope for the best. Good luck!

name: Piano at 5 am
description: "Piano at 5 am." is a short text adventure game. A girl who is the main character wanders in a fog forest while adjusting the four factors of "drowsiness," "thirst," "madness," and "recharge," which increase or decrease depending on the choices she makes.

name: Nox Archaist: Lord of Storms
description: An expansion pack for Nox Archaist, containing the original story plus a new scenario and new features. Puzzles and powerful magic items await, along with dangerous traps and monsters. Those foolhardy enough to brave these perils will come face to face with the Lord of Storms! 15+ hours gameplay.

name: Flora Domina
description: In this unique take on turn-based 4X strategy, play as a nature goddess that defends her island by playing cards to use nature as your ally.

name: Microids Indie Bundle
description: Experience four indie gems with this bundle focused on games by Microids Indie.

name: Nature is Hungry
description: After a plane crash, fight for survival against deadly predators. Gather essential supplies to stay alive and uncover the mystery behind two long-dead skeletons and the crocodiles' presence. In this horror FPS game, the night is your greatest enemy. Can you survive until dawn and solve the mystery?

name: Amulet of Lovar
description: Amulet of Lovar is an oldschool roguelike inspired by Nethack. Delve deep into the Dungeon of Iovar, steal the amulet of the divine and ascend to godhood!

name: PieClicker
