description: PieClicker is a beautiful clicker game designed to be visually appealing. Click, Get Pies, Upgrade Pies.

name: Follow Me
description: A great pixel adventure in a vast, coluorful world. Aren't you curious what's behind the door? You wouldn't know until you look there. Follow the white rabbit. Exploration, interaction, friends, enemies and even some bosses to defeat. All this in a beautiful pixel art 2D platformer.

name: Watchers of the Universe: I'm Outta Here!
description: A realistic, Anunnaki-themed adventure set on Nibiru. The story is about how one motivates himself to step into the path of the Watchers, the powerful minions of local repressive regimes. Due to the nature of this cruel galactic theocracy, you can only play male characters.

name: The One: Chapter 2
description: Every hundreds of years or more, a male will be born, some say he will be a god amongst men who will save them as he will give them gifts that will make them Stronger, faster, better..... Follows "the One Chapter 1", The adventure continues.

name: Embarrassed Shina-chan: The Naked Wandering College Girl
description: Get up in the morning and see a naked female college student lying on the shadow in front of the station closest to the university If you are discovered by the police, your life will become messy! The 3D invisible action game of betting on Shy's life began ...

name: Oxygen Caliber
description: Use recoil and grappling hooks to navigate in a dangerous deep space environment as a stranded astronaut.

name: Infinite Incantation
description: Fight for survival as you battle massive hordes of enemies. Wield powerful spells that you can mutate and evolve to ludicrous strength. Customize your character's stats, elemental affinities, and make upgrades to become the ultimate spell-slinging force of destruction.

name: RICE: Repetitive Indie Combat Experience
description: A rich paragraph of information which will try to charm and pique interest, trying to catch your eye in a sea of competition using a slew of buzzwords such as ‘bullet heaven’ and ‘in-depth meta-progression’, in a vain attempt to make you believe this game is any different from others in it’s genre.

name: Ariokan
description:
Ariokan is an online card game in which the meta (= the most frequently played decks) is continuously evolving because players can create their own cards.
This means that all decks are different, as all players can create cards tailored around their strategy or that counter the mainstream ones.
It doesn't matter if you're a new player or a veteran: there's always something new to create and experiment in Ariokan. Craft your victory!

name: Aether: Trading Card Game
description:
Aether: Trading Card Game is an exhilarating online competitive game that seamlessly blends strategy and fantasy. Engage in 1-on-1 duels with other players or AI opponents, utilizing a unique set of Adventurers, spells, and creatures. Each match is a race to defeat the enemy Adventurer, creating a fast-paced and intense gaming experience.

Every Adventurer in Aether is carefully crafted, each possessing a distinctive design and playstyle. They are not just a character, but a portal to a unique set of creatures, spells, and Relics, offering a multitude of strategic paths. You can summon creatures onto the battlefield to fight for you, or equip powerful Relics to gain the upper hand and dive directly into the fray.

name: Gods of Defense
description: Next level in Tower Defense Rogue-like game progression. GoD offers a bunch of novel mechanics that allow you to craft your unique play style. In addition to traditional weapon towers, you can play with Tornadoes and Dragons. You can worship your favorite Gods to unlock their specials attacks.

name: Amazing Maze
description: Amazing Maze is a minimalistic "roll a ball" game where you have to capture all the crystals and find the way out in beautiful 3D mazes. Use your creativity and logical thinking to overcome obstacles or use them to your advantage.

name: Frightened
description: Frightened is a cooperative horror and survival game that can be played with 1-4 players. Your goal is to destroy the evil with your team and leave. Collect items in the area with your team, find the demon's weak spot and destroy it! But don't you dare get caught.

name: We. The Refugees: Ticket to Europe
description: A socially engaged existential visual novel based on a huge number of choices and consequences. Become a journalist who pretends to be a refugee and tries to cross the Mediterranean Sea illegally to do research for his upcoming book. Inspired by true events.

name: Vagabond
description: Explore procedurally generated living worlds in this 2D sandbox RPG. Meet hundreds of characters in cities, complete quests, craft powerful items, buy and furnish your home or fight monsters in dungeons.

name: Midnight Shift
description: Escape a mannequin storage facility.

name: Dialogue Box: The Road Less Traveled
description: A rage-inducing skill based game with a dynamic story that unfolds using the player choices

name: Monster Tribe
description: Explore an island filled with collectible creatures, a vast and varied wilderness, and dangerous towers on your way to restoring harmony with the land of Akama.

name: City of Beats
description: Explore the ever-changing skyline of a city driven by music in City of Beats, a rhythmic rogue-lite shooter. Get into a zen-like flow state during combat, where every action is synced to the beat. Shoot, groove, loot, upgrade, repeat.

name: Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore
description: Ethyrial: Echoes Of Yore is inspired by the old-school MMORPG, set on the lands of Iremesa, uncover secrets, explore new lands, craft your own spells and armor, the freedom is yours!

name: Our Winding Road
description: Sin descripción

name: GrimGrimoire OnceMore: Limited Edition
description:
The GrimGrimoire OnceMore Limited Edition includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of the Game
- "Witches & Wonders" Hardcover Artbook
- "Spellbinding Symphonies" 2-disc Soundtrack
- "Magical Mayhem" 17" x 24" Cloth Poster
- "Once More Upon A Time" Acrylic Display
- "Portable Spells" Keychains (Set of 4)
- "Mythical Portraits" Art Cards (Set of 5)
- Collector's Box

name: Escape with AI
description: Escape from the room with an AI installed. A short escape game using ChatGPT.

name: Boxbrawl Delivery
description:
Welcome to Boxbrawl Delivery! Run n’ jump, grab n’ go, and haul n’ brawl with the best delivery service in the business!

Take the role of Carter, deliveryman for Zaplift, aiming to satisfy the town and score a good tip! With plenty of pests running amok (and with your co-worker Carrie watching over the inventory), it’s up to you to ensure your customers get their goods in one piece! Can you deliver on your promises, or will your customers’ ratings say otherwise?

name: Bleeding Canvas
description:
Your college crush, Mikey, seems to be the perfect boy for you: He’s artsy, yet extroverted; sometimes a bit stupid and socially inept. But that’s why you love him. You didn’t think you had a chance with him, as you only ever talked to him in passing conversations, but when you try to follow him home you discover something about him that definitely proves his undying love for you…

There are four endings. Two bad endings, a good ending, and a not-so-secret secret ending.

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Slug
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster".

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Clione
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster".

name: Barrel It: The Water Adventure
description:
Are you ready for the ultimate barrel-riding adventure? In this hilarious hyper casual game, you are on top of a rolling barrel and you need to avoid obstacles, and collect water to get to the finish line.

Sounds easy, right? Wrong! The barrel is unpredictable and will bounce, spin and roll in all directions. You have to balance yourself and steer the barrel with your finger. Watch out for rocks, logs, spikes and other hazards that will knock you off or slow you down.

And don't forget to collect water along the way, because you need it to keep the barrel rolling. The more water you have, the higher the chances of success are! The less water you have, the more likely you are to fail.

Can you make it to the end of each level without falling off or running out of water? Find out in this crazy and fun game that will test your reflexes and your sense of humor.

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Anemone
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Anemone (Buster)

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Orca
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Orca (Buster)

name: Hell of a Racket
description:
Play as a fallen angel seeking redemption by punishing satanic worshipers who don't play the holiest of sports....tennis! Use your blessed racket to wreak havoc and show these satanic practices have no standing in God's land!

Hell of a Racket is a unique twist on an old-school genre: First-Person Shooter? No. First-Person Swinger! Engage with enemies in a unique way by reflecting projectiles at them with your racket or simply smacking them! Jump, dash, run, or wall-climb your way around the arena and kill your enemies as you work your way to the final boss: Pickle Ball Satan!

name: Ninja Golf 2
description: A Golf game, Vampire Survivors like, with lot of Shmup inside

name: Knock the Bloody Door Down
description: It's hard to be a human in a world of vampires, isn't it? Explore an underground society, uncover its secrets, and make friends along the way. What awaits you on the path ahead - adventure? Or merely more heartache?

name: Innkeeper's Basement
description: Innkeeper's Basement is a roguelike card game mixed with minesweeper, where you can create over 5000 unique character combinations! Explore the dungeon, build you deck, drink alcohol to forget bad decisions and vanquish monsters!

name: Hilm
description: Hilm is a classic 3D runner with a 3rd person view.

name: Deal & Wheeler
description: The world's most comprehensive car selling simulation game. Build your own huge empire on the vast and high-quality open world map. Buy a car and sell a car. Improve your circle and become a great businessman. Don't give up and follow your dreams.

name: Seducing the Devil
description: Seducing the Devil is an erotic Visual Novel filled with choices and multiple endings. You'll encounter 4 major branches, each with its own unique plot. Will you follow your heart or give in to desire? The choice is yours. Are you ready to dive into a world of love and lust? Let the seduction begin!

name: GrimGrimoire OnceMore: Deluxe Edition
description:
The GrimGrimoire OnceMore Deluxe Edition includes:
- The Game
- Mini Art Book
- Original Soundtrack

name: Staffer Case
description:
Staffer Case is a new sort of mystery game, asking players to find clues, arrange them into documents, and point out the contradictions between them to solve a series of murders.

The game is set in a fictional version of London in the 1960s where 10% of all residents have some sort of supernatural ability. In this city, incidents involving staffers, the people who have these abilities, are constantly occurring.

Players take the role of the Mana Affairs Division's newest detective, Notrick, in order to make sense of these incidents. Since the tricks buried within these staffer cases, at their core, revolve around the supernatural abilities of these criminals, conventional investigative methods won't be enough to solve them. Instead, players will have to rely on the documents that explain what their suspects' abilities entail in order to make sense of everything.

name: Toxicity
description: This is a medium challenge map with about 220 monsters on UV and an expected playtime of 20-30 m﻿inutes depending on how much you explore or die. It takes place in a fairly large and open area, but it's structured so that you are still guided along an intended path, and it's your choice to explore off that path or not.

name: Semiaquatic Circus
description: Semiaquatic Circus is an episodically-updating friend-sim styled VN. There is a hidden affection meter in each chapter. Gaining enough affection will allow you to successfully complete a chapter. Game takes around 10 minutes per chapter, more or less.

name: Flappy KFP
description: A Flappy Bird clone about a KFP Employee trying to make their way to work. Don't fall into the fryer!

name: Marathon: Istoria
description:
Marathon: Istoria is an RPG scenario set in the Marathon universe and designed for the Aleph One engine. It pushes the engine to its limits by using advanced character progression, combat, and storytelling.

Customize your character by choosing your class and deciding which weapons you want to specialize in. Utilize the conventional weapons you are familiar with along with a brand new arsenal of spells and abilities. Explore Istoria while discovering its secrets and how you fit in the world through a combination of terminals and communicating with the recently deceased.

People that have played other Bungie games may recognize some influences from Pathways Into Darkness and Myth. A few sounds, the weapon leveling, level transitions with saved state, and ability to talk to the dead are ideas largely taken from PiD. People familiar with Myth may recognize a couple of the spells you get in the game.

name: Ciudad Alfombra
description: In this game, you must dodge the obstacles in the city and complete the missions available. There is a wide variety of vehicles and colors, such as minivans and large buses.

name: Infested Lands
description: Infested Lands is an addictive game that takes players to a dangerous world where monsters rule. The player takes on the role of a military man who has been sent to a territory known as the "Infested Lands"

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws Pack: Korea
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Sex Simulator: The Beach House
description: An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring HD graphics and videos, with realistic looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a hot man who has sex with three lucky women inside his luxurious beach house.

name: Brave Adventurer
description: Brave Adventurer - The story of a vagabond who travels through Middle-earth and is the victim of an attack by bandits, resulting in serious injury. You enter the world of demons through the use of dark magic.

name: Bone Boy
description: Feeling bad to the bone? Shred through the body as Bone Boy - learn rad tricks, help your friends and collect epic hats along the way. Get out there and tear it up, kid!

name: Madness Chambers
description: Madness Chambers is an incredibly addictive and action packed physics platform shooter

name: Jump Up, Jerry!
description: Jump Up, Jerry! is an arcade platformer where you have to jump your way through different types of cable cars and enemies in order to reach for your highest score.

name: Invasion: Family Ties
description: Rick travels to Indiana to visit his mother, but during his stay, unexpected events occur that lead him on a thrilling adventure. However, little does he know that a major threat looms on the horizon that will change everything. Will Rick be able to save the day and protect those he cares about?

name: Skiing Frenzy
description: It's skiing day! Skiing Frenzy is a 2D top-down, retro-style ski game where you can play Slalom and Free Ski modes, each one giving you different challenges and lots of fun.

name: Don't Beg for Help
description: A horror visual novel game with "Tales from the Crypt" style plot.

name: Sex Room 2: 18+
description: SEX Room 2 [18+] is a steamy and seductive casual clicker game. Sex Room 2 [18+] is a game that invites you to immerse yourself in a world of passion and pleasure. You can upgrade generators and clickers, purchase new sex toys, and enjoy adult content

name: Ice Flame
description: Ice Flame - an exciting game about the adventures of an incredible cat who travels in search of magical fire through an icy mountain. However, on the way to his goal, he will have to overcome many traps and overcome various obstacles on his difficult path!

name: Assassins of Darkness
description: After the death of Emperor without an heir, the Eastern Empire disintegrated and fell into turbulent times. Sakura, an elite assassin who betrayed her clan. She sought the power of darkness with the desire to end the civil war and unite all the clans into a new empire under her rule.

name: Pixel Town: Akanemachi Mystery 2
description: Disturbances have returned to Akanemachi. It's now up to Aya and her new ally, Fuu, to quell the evil and bring peace back to Akanemachi for good!

name: Artemis: Book One
description: Artemis is a visual novel intended for the adult audience. You begin your road to recovery three years following a traumatic event, where you'll eventually find yourself shaping the technological future.

name: The Filfth of Us
description: Sin descripción

name: Gold Girls
description: Enjoy a relaxing puzzle game that will keep you in a good mood.

name: Dungeon Rummage: Rise of the Allies!
description: Dungeon Rummage - Rise of the Allies is a short dungeon crawler created for the Harold Jam 2023, Ascend of the Allies. Pick your character and escape the dungeon, where the allies are currently held hostage.

name: Strato-Scruffy
description: Long awaited since 2009, Strato-Scruffy has now been finished. It's a Fantasy Zone-style shmup game with fancy graphics and bosses for its time.

name: Shigeru Planet
description:
A boisterous and bizarre commotion! Overrun the planet with chatter-plants!
Propagate these eccentric yet endearing chatter-plants, only if you dare! Operate a UFO and strive to spawn as many of them as you can before time runs out. Revel in the outlandish frenzy that can only be experienced here on Shigeru Planet!

The fourth release from the 2022 New Hire Onboarding Program at Bandai Namco Studios!

name: Autophagy
description: Autophagy.WAD is an old school megawad aiming for a mixture of Evilution, Scythe, Demonfear, and other classic experiences. Levels range from very easy to moderately challenging. This should be played in dsda-doom -complevel 2. 33 retro maps with fast and intense action!

name: En Campaña
description: One last map before my surgery for scoliosis. This one's a small limit-removing stroll. Only 94 monsters. It should take you no more than 7 or 8 minutes to beat on your first go.

name: Hai Byouin Tansaku
description:
The protagonist heads to an abandoned hospital at the request of a friend...
A first-person horror game about finding out what happened in an abandoned hospital.

name: Team Fortress 2 Classic: Fight or Flight
description:
The Fight or Flight update, was the second major update for Team Fortress 2 Classic.

True to its namesake, it focused on content related to mobility, as well as several weapons and maps. Its flagship feature is the Jump Pad, an Engineer building that allows taking to the skies. The Anti-Aircraft Cannon was designed for Heavy to swat enemies out of the air, while the Twin Barrel affords Pyro greater mobility. The Brick gives Scout a hard-hitting projectile, while the Heavy gains Chekhov's Punch and the Pyro gains the Harvester - both weapons that store critical hits for later. Finally, L'escampette gives the Spy an alternate watch, allowing for easier escapes.

The update also introduces the Arena map Floodgate, the Four-Team King of the Hill map Frigid, the Payload map Jinn, the Four-Team Medieval Mode map Krepost, and the new Territorial Domination game mode with the map Caper.

name: Elden Ring: The Convergence
description: The Convergence mod is an exhaustive overhaul of Elden Ring with dozens of new weapons, hundreds of new spells, extensively revamped areas and maps, improved visuals, new enemies, bosses and much more.

name: Lofi Ball: Dungeon
description: This DLC will give you 10 more levels to play and some more customization for your ball

name: Eternal Boys Side Project: Twilight Spica
description: Eternal Boys Side Project: Twilight Spica is a spinoff visual novel game of the original anime Eternal Boys.

name: Angelic Chaos Re-Boot!
description:
It began as a day just like any other.
A dull morning, an uneventful trip to school, an afternoon of tedious lectures...
And then I met her.

name: Grisaia: Chronos Rebellion
description: The newest installment in the Grisaia visual novel series. All of the girls from Mihama, past and present, must face off against a new evil terrorist organization in an all-out war.

name: Run Legends
description:
Walk or run outside to fight “Sappers” - enemies that represent real-life anxieties. Build mental and physical health as you upgrade your gear, make new friends, and learn more about the characters' backstories.
Run Legends is the first-ever cooperative fitness game that you can play synchronously with your friends, no matter where they are in the world. Your movement controls your character: head outside and unleash skills in battle by moving faster and slower.

name: Mystic Ring
description: Test your skill against an endless barrage of slime! Using your Mystic Ring, isolate each slime with a continuous straight line, then cast your spell. Beware, any slime still left in a group will survive!

name: Galeao's Dreams
description:
Galeão's Dreams takes players on an exciting adventure through a series of dreamscapes, where they'll have to navigate various obstacles and defeat enemies to save the villagers of DreamsLand. As Galeão, players will face off against a range of enemies.

The game's retro-inspired graphics and music will transport players back to the golden age of platformers in the 80s and 90s. The visuals are rendered in 16-bits, giving the game a classic, pixelated look that pays homage to the NES games of old. The music is upbeat and catchy, with chiptune-style melodies that will keep players engaged and motivated as they progress through the levels.

Galeão's abilities are relatively simple, but players will need to master them to make it through the levels unscathed. He can jump to avoid obstacles and he can also turn into a Tornado when jumping to attack enemies. Players will need to time their attacks carefully to take down enemies without getting hit themselves.

The ultimate goal of Galeão's Dreams is to defeat Galeão's evil brother, Peter, and his henchmen, Galebot, the Slippers, and TokTok. Peter's motivation for attacking DreamsLand is simple: he wants to take over the world and plunge it into darkness. Galeão is the only one who can stop him, and he'll need to use all his skills and abilities to save the day.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Shadow's Fall
description: The Legend of Zelda: The Shadow’s Fall is a short 2-4 hour long hack that was made over the course of 18 hours as part of a casual challenge between Letterbomb, Zarby89, Scawful, and Jared_Brian_. Each had to design the entirety of the overworld, dungeons, story, ASM, and everything else in between with the 18-hour time limit, only allowing extra time for testing and bug fixing.

name: Sausage Wars: Laser Massacre
description:
This is no place to make friends. Escape from imminent death, find the safe spot and push other sausages into the deadly beam!
With this DLC you will get access to a new Laser stage in each local multiplayer mode.

name: Sausage Wars: Trapdoor Hell
description:
Battle other sausages on a new, unstable ground. Trigger the trapdoors and watch the suckers fall into the toxic soup!
With this DLC you will get access to a new Trapdoor stage in each local multiplayer mode.

name: Run Sausage Run: Complete Edition
description:
Complete Edition includes:
- base game with 150 deadly levels, over 80 jucy skins and tasty powerups,
- three new skins: Fly, Cockroach and Plucked Chicken,
- extra 15,000 coins to spend on outfits, powerups, or whatever.

name: Sausage Wars: Deadly Levels
description:
Trigger the trapdoors and watch the suckers fall into the toxic soup!
Wait for the right moment, push the sausage homies in the fire and watch them cook well!
Escape from imminent death, find the safe spot and push other sausages into the laser beam!

With this DLC pack you will get access to 3 new stages in each local multiplayer mode.

name: Medieval Simulators: Baker
description: A relaxing simulator for lovers of the Middle Ages and nature. You take on the role of a medieval baker who has to earn coins, improve his own farm, harvest wheat, grind grain, chop wood and bake...

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 04
description: Season 2 Episode 4: Carcaptors! Mini, having spent all night pacing the streets of Hella City, embarks on a half-baked while half-asleep plan for revenge.

name: Kemono Friends: Opening Day
description: A fan visual novel where you join Nana at Japari Park as new caretaker. Fun and food await in adventures with an energetic serval cat and an always hungry fox!

name: Run Sausage Run: Coins, Bugs and Chicken
description:
Three new sausages: Fly, Cockroach and Plucked Chicken
and 15,000 coins to unlock your favorites sausages with powerups.

name: Sausage Wars: Complete Edition
description: Complete Edition includes the full game and 3 additional stages: Trapdoor Hell, Laser Massacre and Burning Death.

name: Swords & Bones: Definitive Edition
description: Grab the sword and defend the Kingdom of Vestus in an adventure full of action in the spirit of classic retro games.

name: Sausage Wars: Burning Death
description:
Wait for the right moment, push the sausage homies in the fire and watch them cook well. Just don't get roasted!
With this DLC you will get access to a new Burning stage in each local multiplayer mode.

name: Hasbro Kids Bundle
description:
An Outright Games bundle in support of UNICEF.

Featuring a collection of family fun games, available to purchase for a limited time.

name: I'm Scared of My Girlfriend
description: A short vn about sex and fear.

name: Voltorometer Recharged+
description:
A remake of the game Voltorometer, released in 2009, with improved graphics, sound, controller support and more than 3 times the amount of content.

A simple platformer, run and jump to reach the end of each stage and progress through all the worlds to destroy the factories that trapped you and tried to harvest your electrical energy, unlock new modes and challenges by collecting all the power orbs in each level.

name: Unalive 010
description: Welcome to the captivating world of Unalive - a game where the hero must battle fierce monsters using their shooting skills. You will navigate randomly generated room labyrinths and face challenging bosses, while mysterious events unfold throughout the game. Be prepared for unpredictable challenges and tests at every turn, creating an immersive atmosphere that draws the player deeper into the world's mysteries and enigmas. Will you be able to unravel all the secrets of Unalive? Only time will tell...

name: Just Find It
description: Put your observation skills to the test in Just Find the Difference!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Hidden Paradise
description:
A perfect place for a weekend getaway with friends. This DLC includes:
- Roller coaster map: Hidden Paradise.
- One roller coaster cart.

name: Rest House III: Chlorophilia
description: Explore Rest House III intriguing world and step into a dark and wet Chlorophilia. Psychological first person adventure. All the population moved to the capital. You are special correspondent of the famous journal. Disaster! What will happen to the earth in the future? Psychological human dilemmas.

name: Don't Take It Personally, I Just Don't Like You
description: The lo-fi anime dating sim to cry to. A love letter to cassette tapes, old computers, and unrequited romance.

name: Green Reaper
description: Play as Rubin, a rose ensorcelled by the goddess Antheia and entrusted with her sacred scythe. Mushroom marauders have invaded the greenhouse, targeting the garden goddess and choking the life out of her children. It is your duty to traverse the expanse of the greenhouse and slay these invaders.

name: Dig Deep: Chunky Pets
description:
Unleash new bonuses and dominate the game - upgrade now!
Our new animal companions are here to take your gameplay to the next level by providing you with new bonuses such as increased basket capacity and faster experience gain. With Working animals DLC you'll be able to collect more items and level up faster than ever before!

name: Amaze!: Level Pack 2
description:
Are you ready for an even greater challenge in your favorite game? Our DLC - Level Pack 2 - is here to take your gameplay to the next level!

With Level Pack 2 you'll get an extra 150 levels in Classic mode and an additional 50 levels in the more challenging Time Rush mode. Can you beat them all and become the ultimate champion?

Upgrade your game now and discover the exciting new world of challenges and adventures that await you with Level Pack 2 DLC.

name: Amaze!: Level Pack 1
description:
Looking for more challenges and excitement in your favorite game? Look no further than our latest DLC - Level Pack 1 !

With this DLC, you'll get an extra 150 levels in Classic mode and an additional 50 levels in Limited Moves.

Take on new challenges and test your skills with the added levels. Can you beat them all and become the ultimate champion? There's only one way to find out - get your copy of Level Pack 1 DLC today!

name: Burger Impact: Solar Strike
description: Burger Impact is a surreal high-speed physics-based 3d action game built in Unreal Engine 5. As Burger, a space-faring fast food on an adventure to rescue French Fries, engage in the original “space-billiards realtime combat system,” orbiting and launching objects to battle and overcome challenges!

name: Amalgamare
description: In this 2D horror adventure game, play as the protagonist May as she is siphoned into a horrific new world on Halloween night. In a brave feat of love for her cat Matilda, May embarks on a gruesome journey through an otherworldly environment where she must utilize her wits to find her way out.

name: Hyper Hentai Bikini Party
description: Hyper Hentai Bikini Party is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of bikini and multiple unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Meatgun
description: The top-down roguelike shooter where your ammunition is edible. Delve into The Facility and fight off hordes of mutant vegetables with your Meatgun: Shoot meat to damage enemies, and eat meat to heal. Collect various items and combine their effects to become a powerful, veggie-killing machine.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Dinosaurs
description: Poly Jigsaw: Dinosaurs is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a dinos.

name: Survival for Treasure
description: Welcome to the world of "Zombie Treasure Hunt," an exciting survival game where you must face hordes of zombies to reach your goal. The game is divided into two thrilling modes: campaign mode and online mode.

name: Mine
description: Mine is a horror game in the style of back rooms. Accompanied by an excellent visual, it will allow you to plunge into the nightmare happening around the hero. Realistic camera and sounds complement your emotions. And monsters will create tension and make you pretty scared.

name: Amaze!
description:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles.

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

name: Dormitory Love
description: Romantic love comedy with six unique students from abroad.

name: Lightballs
description: Lightballs is local multiplayer, silly footlball game for 2 players. There are 2 mods to play

name: So Much Stuff 2
description: So much more stuff to find in this game!

name: Neon Survivors
description: ANNIHILATE a small army's worth of ghouls, knaves and miners, with the power of lasers, missiles and kidneys! You're alone against these hordes with nothing but INCREDIBLE WEAPONRY and MURDEROUS INTENT. Can you survive for FOUR MINUTES?

name: Shutter
description: In Shutter you play as Keith, a new employee that has arrived at the mysterious research center L.I.E. (Learn, Investigate and Exploit). Explore and solve puzzles with a camera that modifies objects using perspective. All in a space-age inspired setting.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 4 - Collector's Edition
description: Avi Games presents the newest game in the Big Adventure series with Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 4! Packed with challenging hidden-object scenes and clever mini-games, this European holiday offers a vacation experience like no other!

name: No.Break Brick
description: Break the bricks and clear your view! This game is a casual game where players break bricks with small balls to penetrate the defense of a beautiful girl and open her heart.

name: Re:Touring
description: Re:Touring is a first-person puzzle game in which you'll explore the abandoned Luoni Energy Competence Center and uncover the facility's history, navigating through a total of 26 varied levels. Using a retro-style computer, you'll create color patterns to control elements such as doors, platforms and lasers. Each mechanism is carefully introduced to make the game accessible to everyone.

name: Hidden Cats in Town
description: Find the hidden cute cats in the relaxing hand-painted town scenery. There are many cats here. Meow Meow···Meow Meow···

name: Space Pirates for Life
description: A 2D Sci-fi Action Platformer about a Space Pirate who has crash-landed on an unknown planet. Hack, slash and explore this bizarre and challenging retro-style world.

name: Toaplan Arcade 2
description:
Enjoy some of Toaplan's finest arcade titles with this new collection of 7 games for Evercade.

Includes:
- Fire Shark
- Twin Cobra
- Twin Hawk
- Hellfire
- Rally Bike
- Wardner
- Demon's World

name: The C64 Collection 2
description:
TheC64 Collection 2 brings 14 8-bit home computer classics from the beloved C64 platform to Evercade.

Includes :
- California Games
- Cybernoid
- Firelord
- Impossible Mission II
- Insects in Space
- Mission Impossibubble
- Nebulus
- Pitstop II
- Slayer
- Street Sports Basketball
- Sword of Fargoal
- Uridum
- World Games
- Zamzara

name: Dual Chroma: Academy Carols
description: Spend winter break with the popular and unapproachable Prince of the Empire in this cozy and heartwarming magic academy dating sim.

name: Paper Bride 4: Bound Love
description: "Paper Bride 4 Bound Love" is a Chinese horror puzzle game, the fourth work in the "Paper Bride" series. Welcome everyone to return to the world of Paper Bride. This time, let us uncover the secrets of Yichang Town together.

name: The Unfound Soul
description: Unlock the ultimate power in this turn-based roguelike adventure game, where you'll combine artifacts to create even more powerful ones. Collect over 1000 weapons, armor pieces, and artifacts as you vanquish your foes and rise to the top as the ultimate soul. Test your skills and strategic planning in intricate and deep turn-based combat as you navigate through challenging levels, discovering powerful artifacts and building your ultimate arsenal. With over 1000 items to find, the possibilities are endless.

name: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor - Deluxe Edition
description:
The story of Cal Kestis continues in Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, a third-person, galaxy-spanning, action-adventure game from Respawn Entertainment, developed in collaboration with Lucasfilm Games. This narratively driven, single-player title picks up five years after the events of Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and follows Cal’s increasingly desperate fight as the galaxy descends further into darkness. Pushed to the edges of the galaxy by the Empire, Cal will find himself surrounded by threats new and familiar. As one of the last surviving Jedi Knights, Cal is driven to make a stand during the galaxy’s darkest times — but how far is he willing to go to protect himself, his crew, and the legacy of the Jedi Order?

The Deluxe Edition includes exclusive cosmetic items for Cal, inspired by Han Solo and Luke Skywalker, as seen in Star Wars: A New Hope.

name: Temple of Kasthet
description: Brian Teaser must escape from a mysterious Temple by solving mindblowing puzzles before they, well, blow his mind.

name: Wanted Driver
description: Drive car and escape cops! Drive fast as you can to evade the cops. Buy faster cars and become the fastest driver.

name: Dino Trauma
description: Dino Tauma introduces you to a secret laboratory somewhere in eastern Europe where gore and dinosaurs isn't unusual thing. Retro FPS inspired by the '90s legends.

name: EternaMine
description: Do you like clicker games but wish they had more of a "game" in them? Then EternaMine is for you. Mine, fight monsters, upgrade your gear, obtain rare items and mine some more in the massive follow-up to the popular title "Haste-Miner 2".

name: Mice Tea
description:
Margaret de Campos, a store clerk frustrated with her current position in life, finds a tea that turns her into an anthropomorphic mouse. Things only seem to get weirder and more transformative as they go on.

Margaret de Campos is a young clerk at a local bookstore who needs some change in her life. Her job feels like a dead end, her love life is in a rut, and she's not happy with how she looks. All of that is upended when she stumbles upon a box of magical tea with the tendency to transform people into anthropomorphic animals. Depending on your choices, the lives of Margaret, her friends, and her coworkers are irrevocably changed as the story leads to several wildly different paths. Help Margaret find love and a deeper understanding of herself and her... proclivities by playing Mice Tea!

name: Kitari and Kimoshi
description: Kitari and Kimoshi is a story about two girls who meet for the very first time through unusual circumstances. Click through the manga pages, and make choices that affect the flow of the story.

name: Prima Doll: Fuyuzora Hanabi/Sekka Monyou
description: Prima Doll: Fuyuzora Hanabi/Sekka Mon'you is the first volume of a kinetic novel series based on the multimedia project Prima Doll that adapts the Haizakura and Karasuba prequel episode originally serialized for the official website.

name: Skinny & Franko: Fists of Violence
description: Brutal next chapter of Amiga's legendary beat'em'up 'Franko: The Crazy Revenge' is here. It's time to clean the streets of shit. The iconic game finally gets a sequel it deserves.

name: Dead Island 2: Hell-a Edition
description:
Dead Island 2 takes players across the most iconic locations of the City of Angels, now stained with horror, in an exciting pulp journey from the verdant suburbia of Beverly Hills to the quirky promenade of Venice Beach.

HELL-A Edition includes:
- Steelbook
- Season expansion pass
- Venice Beach travel map
- 6 slayer Tarot Cards
- 2 pin badges
- 1 patch
- 1 bonus weapons pack
- 2 additional DLC packs
- Memories of Banoi Pack

name: The Ramsey
description: The Ramsey is a 2D exploration platform game that solves puzzles using various weapons by controlling cute squirrel characters. Explore the maze of islands and defeat the villains who threaten the peace of the planet.

name: Sole Saga
description: Battle with horde of monsters, Build your favorite hero with powerful skills and weapons in Action Roguelike style, Fight your way to the epic boss and become a legend.

name: Varney Lake
description: Summer, 1954. A perfect vacation awaits three best friends, playing games, making crazy plans, and running from bullies... Until they meet the vampire. What really happened that summer at Varney Lake?

name: Deathwish Enforcers
description: It’s the 1970’s and crime is running rampant! Join the Deathwish Enforcers squad and take crime down a notch! One to four-player single screen cooperative action! Meet happy hookers, flashers and drug dealers! Invade porn shoots, satanic rituals and volcanic evil lairs! Stop the evil syndicate at all costs!

name: Elegies: Aya
description: After losing his parents and barely escaping his burning home, Zach wakes up in the hospital where he meets Aya, the ghost of a girl. Who is she, and why can only Zach see her? Together they try to investigate Aya's past, which quickly awakens new dangers.

name: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor
description: The story of Cal Kestis continues in Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, a third-person, galaxy-spanning, action-adventure game from Respawn Entertainment, developed in collaboration with Lucasfilm Games. This narratively driven, single-player title picks up five years after the events of Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and follows Cal’s increasingly desperate fight as the galaxy descends further into darkness. Pushed to the edges of the galaxy by the Empire, Cal will find himself surrounded by threats new and familiar. As one of the last surviving Jedi Knights, Cal is driven to make a stand during the galaxy’s darkest times — but how far is he willing to go to protect himself, his crew, and the legacy of the Jedi Order?

name: Leveling Up Girls in Another World
description: Travel Aporia to save it from the Demon Queen Nazmul. Guide a team of girls through strategic fights and strengthen your bonds in this dungeon crawler RPG.

name: Chernobyl: Origins
description: "Chernobyl: Origins" - is a quest game with psychological horror elements. You have to solve a lot of puzzles to find out the terrible secret of the catastrophe at the nuclear power plant. The game will take you to 1986, to the Chernobyl nuclear power plant.

name: Minabo: A Walk Through Life
description: Minabo - A walk through life is a social simulation game where you walk the path of life while your turnip grows and thrives (or not) in its social relationships.

name: Summit
description:
Explore a giant mountain massif in this classical 2D Metroidvania. Climb daring mountain passes, explore forgotten ruins and gather equipment as you ascend your way to the ultimate destination - the Summit.

This already war-torn country has recently been befallen by a mighty set of catastrophes. Your unlikely protagonist, a member of the weak Ruby tribe, turned out to be one of a few survivors of the last cataclysm, a giant avalanche. Your initial personal mission quickly turns into the ultimate search for truth - a search that requires you to climb the fabled grand summit.

Your journey begins when you wake up in a mysterious cave. Struck by the blow of a giant avalanche you and your fellow miners have been washed away into the darkness. You must climb out of this crevasse and head to Pinetown - the once great village at the very foot of the Mountain. There might be your only chance to gather the strength, the gear and the knowledge to begin your ascent of the unknown. Your destination - the Summit - is clear, but the way there is as treacherous as it is fabulous.

Along your way you will stumble upon characters of all tribes, foreigners and natives to the mountain. You will find climbing equipment that will be essential for your progression - an icepick, a rope and grappling hook, a parachute and many more. You will also encounter great obstacles, mysteries and enemies which will make your journey even more epic.

This game combines the joy of exploring a large interconnected world with fluid and unique platforming and engaging puzzles.

name: Cartagra: Tsuki Kurui no Yamai - Rebirth FHD Size Edition
description: Cartagra: Tsuki Kurui no Yamai - Rebirth FHD Size Edition is a remastered version of Cartagra: Affliction of the Soul, with upscaled graphics, refining of CGs, a new scenario and scenes, and other quality-of-life changes.

name: GunFu Fighter
description: The first person shooter game with bullet time twist! Using the bullet time effect, the geometric distribution position of the enemy is analyzed and prejudged, and the order of planned attacks gives the opponent a fatal blow.

name: Angle Wars
description: Angle Wars is a tactical top-down war game for one to four players, requiring quick reflexes and a keen eye for angles. Play through the co-op campaign, or go head-to-head in local play to destroy your enemies in a variety of game types.

name: Gematombe
description: Gematombe is an action-puzzle-vs-game where you can play one-on-one matches against your friends or the computer.

name: Rally Horizon
description: You are invited to the motorsport party, come join us and Make This Race Great!

name: StarCraft: Evolution Complete
description: StarCraft: Evolution Complete is a full remake of StarCraft: Brood War, including the campaigns and all 3 races with all of their units, buildings, abilities, researches, upgrades and art.

name: Jewel Blast: Celestris
description:
Drag and drop blocks of gems to line them up.
Completing vertical and horizontal lines will erase the blocks.
When there's no more space for blocks, it's game over.

name: Tin Can: Original Tracks
description: 9 music tracks composed by Thomas Barrandon for Tin Can.

name: Spider Fighter 3
description: Spider Fighter 3 is a free-to-play adventure game from Starplay DMCC. Inspired by Marvel’s Spider-Man, this puts you in control of a web-slinging hero named Peter. Climb walls and swing across town as you fight thugs and mobsters making life difficult for everyday people. Choose between a linear story mode or an open-world sandbox experience.

name: Toy War: Cannon
description: Control a toy сannon. Shoot the toy soldiers with the toy gun just like you did when you were a kid.

name: Gotham Knights: Heroic Assault: The Kelvin Incident
description: The Kelvin Incident is a new Heroic Assault adding a 15-floor raid , Mythic gear, a new suit transmog, 4 new batcycle transmogs, and new stronger enemies.

name: Slasher U: An 18+ Horror Movie Dating Sim
description: An 18+, story-rich dating sim set at America's Horniest Horror Movie University! Explore an open world, date (and boink) a bevy of cuties studying to be horror's Next Big Thing, and (just maybe) get smacked with some pathos along the way.

name: Ancient
description: Small Koohoo-themed cave map. Requires Copper v1.20+

name: Herbal Remedies
description: During the event, follow the prescriptions' instructions and finish the medicinal brews. Upon completion, you will receive in-game items as rewards.

name: Grow Light
description: A short game about a botanist banished to the moon for attempting to create sentient plant life. They move through the sections of their circular lunar base, talking to plants, drinking tea, reading old personal logs, and meditating on rejection and isolation.

name: Blaze Union: Story to Reach the Future
description: Blaze Union: Story to Reach the Future Remaster is a high-definition remaster of the fantasy strategy RPG first released for PSP in May 2010. In addition high-definition visuals, the updated release offers improved operability and tempo, useful features like rewind and auto-save, and various other adjustments that make gameplay more pleasant.

name: Jinki: Infinity
description: JINKI Infinity is an action-packed video game set in a futuristic world where players take on the role of a skilled pilot controlling a powerful mecha. With fast-paced gameplay and an immersive storyline, players will battle against a wide range of enemy mechas, each with their unique strengths and weaknesses.

name: Ash of Gods: The Way - Deluxe Edition
description: Get the turn-based story-driven tactical card game with hand crafted battles, plus digital extras including soundtrack and art book!

name: Star Wars: Heritage Pack
description: Seven Classic Star Wars Games.

name: Ayase, the Sexy Archer
description: Ayase is an archer and hunter of the king's court with the task of traveling far and wide to eliminate the monsters that have ravaged her homeland. This time, Ayase confronts a nest of monster in an abandoned village near the old palace of the king. Follow Ayase and see how far you can go.

name: Chef
description:
Chef is a fun, easy to play tycoon cooking game with 48 levels to complete.

The aim of the game is to prepare and serve the customers their orders. You will need to be quick , efficient and most importantly accurate, wrongly created orders go into the bin, losing you money and serving a customer too slow will lose you much needed income.

In low levels, this may not be a deal breaker, but pretty soon it will get very challenging as you advance your career and move to higher levels.

name: EcoMahjong
description: The classic Mahjong game with a thrilling story!

name: Lovely Cat: Mermaid Castle
description: Wow! There are so many beautiful shell eggs! What kind of little mermaid will be summoned this time? There are various types of mermaids for you to choose! Kitten Mermaid, Bunny Mermaid, Bear Mermaid... There are also limited and rare species of Salamander Mermaid and unicorn mermaid! what are you waiting for? Come to Lovely Cat Mermaid Castle and enjoy the joy of playing with the little mermaids!

name: Adventure Escape Room Bundle
description: Four escape room adventures for you to puzzle through! Sotano, Vereda, Alumni and Subnet.

name: Fortress S
description: The lastest installment in the beloved Fortress series, a fresh take on the artillery shooter genre.

name: Ultimate Shot: 3D Real Strike Shouter Counter
description: Are you ready for the ultimate challenge? Take aim and test your skills in The Ultimate Shot – the action-packed game that will put your precision and strategy to the test.

name: Galaxy Revo: Remake
description: Destroy enemy spaceships and reach new incredible records with Galaxy Revo: Remake!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Ninja Otedama R
description:
Slice and dice but don't drop!?
The definitive version of the deranged party game!

name: Xenon Runner
description: Xenon Runner is a fast paced speedrunning parkour FPS where you compete against yourself, your friends, and the world. Utilize grappling, power sliding, recoil knockback, and wallrunning to complete the levels as fast as possible.

name: Digital Exorcist Case_(0);
description: Step into a dark world where cyberdemons haunt humankind. When mutilated bodies start appearing all over this sleepy town in the Mississippi inaka, Sawyer, ex-Agency operative; now unemployed shut-in, must exorcise the demon perpetrator in this story-rich, PC-98 style adventure game.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Supernova
description: You are the leader of a space-faring civilization at the dawn of the 24th century whose choices for domination are endless: planetary conquest, cultural domination, political alliances, technological supremacy. Your mission is to spread your civilization across the known universe.

name: Eukarion Tales 2
description: Embark on a dangerous adventure and do battle against the forces of Kaos. Complete quests to gain experience, learn new spells and abilities, and equip yourself with powerful weapons and armor. Relive this Flash Classic Today!

name: Arcade Archives: Galaga '88
description: Win the decisive battle in a massive galactic war!

name: Everlasting Abundance
description: A greedy AAA game company rules the world with an iron fist. You must join a faction of independent rebels and defeat the tyranny of Everlasting Abundance. Can you succeed? Is it all just a pointless dream?

name: Enid
description: Help Enid stay aflame while exploring the forest and playing minigames with woodland creatures!

name: Commander: World War II
description: Commander: World War II is a turn-based tactical game where you lead either the Allies or the Axis to victory. Deploy infantry, tanks, planes, and naval units, capture locations, use the terrain, and counter specialized units in intense battles. Design your own maps and dominate the battlefield.

name: Holmes Sherlock & Mycroft
description: Play and get the most clues, ask witnesses for help and manage to solve the case by the end of the week before your opponent with your clues.

name: PixArk: A Sweet Pack for the Sweetest
description: Sweet dreams are made of this! Pixark Candyland is about to take admissions. Get the candy-themed pack, build your own sugary paradise, and share the sweet memory with your friends!

name: KartMania
description: "KartMania" is a real-oriented racing kart game. Changing settings such as seat position and sprocket diameter, Let's capture the circuit course with driving technique!

name: Magemania
description: Magemania is a Hidden Object Puzzle where the player has to get out of castle fortresses, solving riddles, finding secrets and avoiding traps.

name: Idle Dragon Clicker
description: The land has been overrun by evil dragons It needs a leader to bring peace to the land. Start by clicking on the dragon to kill them, and collect coins. Spend that coin on your power and allied Heroes to get more damage. The more damage you deal, the more coins you will get.

name: Cyber Neon Bundle
description:
Step into the neon-soaked world of Cyber Vibes with Cyber Neon Bundle - where you'll hunt, slash and survive your way to victory in two adrenaline-fueled games!
Cyber Neon Bundle is a collection of two cyber theme games; Cyberhunt and Razortron 2000. Both are frenetic action games where you’ll use your skills to win everything!

name: Hentai Maid Memories
description: Hentai Maid Memories is a relaxing puzzle game. Flip tiles and find their match to reveal the sexy maid art beneath. 20 beautiful girls are waiting for you.
